This was sounding more like a bad comic book plot to him now. He knew damn well where he would have ended up if he hadn’t stepped out of the darkness with Selina and the others; he’d be nothing more than a crusty old man all alone in the cave forever.

“Actually, I’m just here to kill you. Cool isn’t it?” B.I.N.O. asked him as he held up a gun loaded with armor piercing rounds. Now this really got Batman confused as it was obvious this wasn’t supposed to be some challenge where he faced a mirror image of himself or how he used to be. First of all, he never says “Cool,” and he would never, under any circumstances, use a gun. Asking what might be a stupid question, the real Batman said “Who are you?” To which the fake one responded “What, are you dense? Are you retarded or something? Who the hell do you think I am? I’m the goddamn-“

*BLAM!*

Shocked and a bit relieved, Batman watched his foe fall to the ground and then vanished into thin air. His eyes immediately turned to where the shot came from, and he saw perhaps the strangest sight he’d ever seen in his life; Joker, dressed as Castro “I LOVE DOING THAT!” Then he just nonchalantly took off the suit revealing his standard attire, and only looked up at the Dark Knight once he kicked the costume aside, where he said “Oh and in case you’re wondering, the answer was ‘Crazy Steve’.”

“Joker.” Batman growled. Now this was a sight that got his blood boiling, especially when his foe kept on grinning like that. As far as Batman was concerned, this was Joker belonged, amidst the fires of Hell. If he were to walk away from this mission with one victory, it would be in making sure that Joker stayed to rot down here.

“Nice to see you to Batsy. Can’t say I’m surprised by the greeting though. You always were such a focused guy, and never one to stop and smell the roses.” As Joker spoke he moved towards his counterpart, only to of course squeeze his corsage and fire poison gas at him. Batman anticipated this and moved his head out of the way before landing a few blows on Joker’s ribs, and then a strong hit to the jaw which caused a bloody tooth to fall from the clown’s mouth as he held his sides.

“Looks like me and you were wrong Joker; we weren’t meant to keep fighting forever or die trying. In the end, one of your own took you down.” Batman jabbed with his words. He may not be a talker, but he always wanted to tell Joker that since his death had come so suddenly. Not to mention, since he was just fighting the Joker’s evil spirit, and since he just established that he could hit it, Batman wasn’t going to hold back and was ready to do everything under the sun to punish the clown for his crimes.

“Oh yeah, Harley.” Joker grunted and spit out another tooth. His mood suddenly shifted back to manic and happy as he slowly got his composure back “Well a few friends of mine are dealing with her right now, and they said I could have you all to myself.” He then let out a low and creepy laugh, only further angering Batman at the thought of what this madman could have done to Harley. Then, Joker told Batman that he wasn’t the only one who wasn’t going to hold back.

“I tell you Bats, things are going to start looking up around here for once thanks those little piggies of yours. From what I heard, we’re going to ravage the whole world, while still leaving just enough people around to torture to our heart’s content. Personally I was on board the second I saw just what those hogs of heroes were doing to the villain population, because let me tell you something buddy boy, Gotham City, hell the whole world deserves a better class of criminal, and I’m gonna give it to ‘em.” Joker said. Batman just stood there and prayed this was the last time he’d have to hear Joker ramble. To ensure that it was, he threw another punch, but was halted when held his hand up to tell him to stop.

“Sorry ‘Bruce’, but there’s this one gag I just can’t resist.” Just as Joker revealed that the demons had told him everything about the Dark Knight, he snapped his fingers and vanished behind a wall of grey blubber. Batman recognized the costumes immediately; Joker had summoned a horde of Catwomen to fight him.

“Look kitties; a rat with wings.” He told them. Every single Catwoman grinned hungrily and savagely at their prey, and each one of them pounced at him.




Catwoman had readied herself from the beginning. She wanted desperately to find Bruce and their daughter, and Tim and everyone else, but first she needed to get out of here; wherever here was. All of a sudden, she heard movement nearby, and bared her claws to whoever was coming. Directly ahead, she saw a certain someone back flipping towards her, despite the fact that her anatomy suggested that was impossible. She would have known who this was even if she wasn’t wearing the same costume. Finally she flipped to right in front of her, her belly and breasts bobbing up and down constantly as she caught her breath, until she finally acknowledged Catwoman “Meow.”

Selina jumped back and hissed at the mirror Catwoman. The double looked identical right down to the costume. The black gloves that nearly reached her shoulders with matching boots, the thing yellow belt, and the grey body suit that hugged her form so well, her breasts and ass was perfectly outlined, Selina actually lost herself for a moment in admiring how sexy she was. Quickly though she shook her head and waited for an attack. It looked like she was going to have to kick her own tail to get out of here. Well that was fine with her, because thankfully her ass was such a huge target.

“Easy kitty, I don’t want to fight you. All I want is to refresh your memory.” Mirror Catwoman spoke. Now that got Selina’s attention, but she didn’t let her guard down for a second, only asking “This will sound redundant, but what the hell are you talking about?” All at once she saw the Mirror Catwoman’s playful smile drop. She looked deeply saddened as she stared at Selina, even as she took a few steps back. Selina just confusingly watched her double move back, and her eyes would really start popping with what happened.

“Poor baby, you really don’t remember do you? You used to be just like me. A child of the night, wild and free…” with every word her double spoke, Selina watched in amazement as not only did her other vanish, but the darkness around her dissolved away and was replaced by the rooftops of Gotham. For once since arriving here, she felt cool as the night air breezed past her. The moon was full and the night was young, and something overcame Selina.

Looking upon herself, she smiled brightly and began to charge forward. Soon the rooftop ended, but like always, Selina leaped across the gap like she was still in the 100 weight range. She landed on her feet, and even as the ground shook beneath them, still she kept moving forward. This all felt so familiar and wonderful, giving her a kind of rush she hadn’t felt in over a year. Soon she began leaping down on her hands and feet to shorter rooftops beneath, basking in just being on the prowl as a voice inside her said “I was the cat that walked by herself, and the city was my playground.”

“I prowled Gotham each evening, going where I liked, and taking what I wanted.” Once at street level, Selina found herself facing a jewelry store. Naturally she brought her claws out and cut a hole through the glass, unable to stop grinning at the sparkling stones. She held them in her hands with the same love and adoration they always made her feel. She would love gems until the day she died. Unfortunately, just as she started running off, an enormous shadow appeared in front of the moon and engulfed her.

“Until I met him.” The ears and the winged cape made it obvious who it was right from the start. He landed right in front of Selina, but as she looked upon him, all she saw was a frightening silhouette with white eyes. Still, Selina ignored her initial instincts and tried to talk to him.

“Bruce? I…I know what this looks like, but-“ before she could say anymore, Batman punched Catwoman right in the face. That had her taken aback, but he didn’t stop there, proceeding to pound her right in the gut and swiftly kicked her right in the head. That knocked her to the ground and scattered the jewels onto the street, and she asked “What are you doing?!”

Batman didn’t answer and prepared to strike again, but Catwoman caught his arm and threw him over her. He came at her as she stood back up, and she managed to block his blows, until finally clawing his face. However, as she watched Bruce hold his wound in his gloved hand, naturally she wanted to comfort her husband. As soon as she got close enough though, he delivered the final blow and the fat cat toppled over.

“I gave him my best fight, but in the end, kitty got her claws clipped.” The voice said. Catwoman certainly felt that way as she cowered in fear as Batman approached her. His hand neared cowering kitty, when all of a sudden she realized and said “Wait, I didn’t think that.”

Batman vanished on sight, and so did all of Gotham, and when Selina’s eyes looked to her side, she saw Mirror Catwoman kneeled down beside her like she had been whispering in her ear. Naturally, she clawed the phony right on her fat face before jumping to her feet.

“Don’t you come near me! I know what you’re trying to do, and I’m not putting up with any of this crap!” Selina hissed. Even as she spit venom at her double though, all she did was just look disgusted at the real thing.

“Admit it, you loved every second of it. The rush, the freedom, and making sure he didn’t take any of that from you. You’ve changed costumes over the years Selina, but you of all people should know that a leopard can’t change her spots.” The double spoke. As she did, Selina watched her costume morph into the others she had made for herself. There was the purple mini-dress with the green cape, the black corset with the blue pants and the huge eye mask along with her whip being used for a tail, and another purple suit that was very much like the costume she wore now except the mask let her hair out in the back. By the time her double was back to Selina’s current suit, she approached the now unsure Catwoman and tried to reach and stroke her cheek while asking “You miss the excitement, the danger. How often have you been tempted?”

“Never.” Selina smacked that flabby hand away from her. Once more she told her double that she didn’t know what she was talking about “I’m not going to lie, I did love doing what ever I wanted, when ever I wanted, just like any cat would. Still, if I had one regret, it was that my lifestyle always got me so close, and yet so far away from him. I always wanted to be with him, but one of us always had to screw things up. The FJL was the best thing to ever happen to me. I may have had to quit playing by my own rules, but I gave it up for something just as great. The rush and delicious sensation of devouring someone alive, letting myself be a fat and happy cat, the best sex of any of my nine lives, and above all else, being married to the love of my life who gave me everything my heart desired.”

“Sounds more like you had to promise to be a good little pet and walk on a leash.” Leave it to the hell version of herself to kill the mood. Again the real Selina hissed at her double “It’s nothing like that. It’s never been like that! What I supposed to do? Say no to the league and get swallowed by Black Canary? The hunger was already inside me, I couldn’t fight it, and I didn’t want to. I gave up one rush for one even more incredible, and I accepted my new nature without question, and aside from stuffing myself with every jailbird there was, it just felt right to be-“

“What? Be a super hero? One of the good little soldiers of the Dark Knight? It was nice idea, but you don’t fit in there. You don’t want to fit in there.” Even now her double wouldn’t listen, and Selina was really getting mad now. She was through talking and wanted to shut this phony up, and it looked like Mirror Catwoman wanted to do the same as she brought out her claws as well “I’m still inside you Selina, and I’m willing to claw at you until you see it to.”




A Catwoman rushed at Batman, but he stood his ground against his heavy and hungry foe. Using her own momentum against her, he Judo flipped her clean over him. Before she even hit the ground though, another Catwoman came right at him; her claws gleaming more than her teeth. She swiped at him again and again, forcing the Dark Knight to narrowly dodge the blows. However, while he was distracted, the third Catwoman came at him from the side and slashed at his chest. Batman grunted in pain as claw marks were left on his symbol, and the second Catwoman took the opportunity to lunge at him.

Her bulk knocked him over and she fell right on top of him. As he was crushed beneath her, with only his head visible underneath the grey clad blubber, Batman looked up past her heavy bosom to see her smirking face. Wanting a taste before she indulged herself, Catwoman pushed down further on her prey as she dropped her head down and brought out her salivating tongue. From his chin and up, she took a good, long lick of her favorite food. The taste made her purr once her fat tongue was back in her mouth. As she happily smacked her lips though, she then felt her nose getting crushed as Batman head butted her. Naturally she cried out in pain, and upon rolling onto her side, allowed Batman to roll free.

Just when it seemed like he was out the woods though, the fourth Catwoman made a grand reentrance by butt slamming right on top of the Caped Crusader. Once more he utterly vanished from sight, with only his head eventually poking out from between the bottom of her cheeks. It was then that Catwoman stood back up, only to jump right back down on him, and each time she put more force into her pulverizing posterior. Not only was it was always fun to throw her weight around, but she figured that enough butt beat downs would be the end of the Dark Knight. Just for variety though, she picked up the squashed bat as she lied down on her side, only to place him between her thunder thighs, and then slam those down onto him next. Her strong and huge legs grinded him up again and again, and not once did Catwoman stop smiling.

Finally she threw him off to the side, and as Batman stumbled as he got back up, he soon felt them all around him. Seriously, with each of them standing in a circle side by side, given how wide they were and how much their guts jutted out, it was impossible not to feel them. They all flashed him hungry grins before heaving their bellies forward. No sooner was he swallowed up by their fat, did all of the Catwomen dig in with their claws and teeth, planning on gorging on as much bat as they could until there was nothing left but bones.

At least, that was the plan, which apparently didn’t go well since he was standing only six feet away from them. Batman just smirked as the hungry cats slowly realized they were clawing at nothing. In reality, when they had started beating him down with their blubber, they had stopped being a threat. Batman had survived Selina doing everything under the son to him with her weight, and the truth was he actually liked being squashed. Not to mention, with his wife sometimes rolling on top of him after they fell asleep, he was a master when it came to move quickly and quietly right out from under her.

The next thing the Catwomen knew, Batman held four Batarangs and threw them all. The first three were hit right in the coconut and fell. They even vanished once they fainted. Just when that happened, a loud and wet squish was heard like a knife through thick blubber. Batman immediately looked in that direction, only to see that the fourth Catwoman had caught the sharp edge of his weapon.

“Bruce?” she said quietly in a confused voice. That was all she could say though as her neck was cut open! The gash was deep and blood poured down from it. Catwoman tried to move her wavering hand up to the wound, hoping in vain that it wasn’t as bad as she felt. Before one finger touched it though, she fell to the ground. Batman immediately rushed to her side and kneeled briefly before bringing himself back up almost immediately.

“No, you’re not real.” He said. No matter what he did though, the sight of his wife slaughtered by his own hands shook him to the very core. Even worse, lightning flashed and in that instance, Bruce saw the bodies of his parents in Selina’s placed. He couldn’t help but remain horrified, but that was when he saw Selina get back up!

Standing in a pool of her own blood, her head remained down, but once she brought it up, her beauty was replaced with the face of a rotting corpse. Skin hung off her decaying skin, the gash was filled with puss, and her eyes glowed white. As her mouth opened and revealed her rotting teeth, she once more leaped at her love.

Batman couldn’t escape; the terror he felt blinded his judgment and he couldn’t focus on slipping out. All he could do was feel the zombie drool on him before she said “What’s wrong Bruce? I thought you loved pussy.”

Hearing that made Batman’s eyes light up. His scowl and focus returned, he head butted another Catwoman, and this one stood back up after so. The next thing she knew, Batman grabbed the top of her mask and pulled with all his might, tearing the entire head off! What he revealed though was the Joker, in a fat suit, who soon found himself meeting Batman’s fist “Very funny *WHAM!* “




After failing to use the real thing as a scratching post, Mirror Catwoman began testing her double on who could really throw her weight around. She grappled her foe from the sides as the real Selina did the same as they heaved their heavy forms against each other and tried to force the other down. They grunted as they pushed the other back and forth, until Mirror Catwoman pushed to the side and managed to knock Selina on her back.

The real Catwoman was far from down and out though, as she swiftly swiped her double’s leg, causing her to fall forward. She took it on the chin, and even with all her padding, there was no way she couldn’t feel another set of her own weight dropping down on her as Selina body slammed her. Even when Mirror Catwoman had the wind knocked out of her though, she heaved the two of them over and made Selina fall to the ground, just before her double rolled over her like a steamroller.

Mirror Catwoman got back up before Selina could, and grabbed her head before slamming it into the ground. What she didn’t count on was a swift leg sweep though, which toppled the evil double. Now Selina was able to get back on her feet, and now with her head clear, by the time her copy got back up, Selina leaped up and delivered a swinging kick to the head. She always did love how agile she still was even with her lovely fat, but throwing her weight around was just as fun, which is why she charged at her foe like a rampaging bull once more.

Again the two Catwomen were locked in a power struggle, but this time the kid gloves were off, and the claws in their actual gloves came out. Every time they grabbed the other, they tore clean through the fabric of their costumes, revealing blubber coated feminine figures more with ever strike. Mirror Catwoman soon had the back of her suit ripped to shreds as the claw marks even dug into her skin, along with her mask being torn almost clean off save for upper right corner that still covered that eye, and the fabric covering her knockers was quickly ripped to shreds. Selina meanwhile had her foe savagely clawing at her immense ass, unwilling to stop until she cut something other than the costume, but all she managed to do was turn that entire section of the suit into ribbons before one of Selina’s blows stopped her. Mirror Catwoman’s claws accidentally dragged down her foe’s legs, exposing some of her thighs, but then she came right back up Selina’s belly and did the same to that portion. The real Catwoman momentarily cried out in pain as the claws dug much deeper than before, but before her blood could be shed, she heaved her belly forward yet again, which trapped her claws in the creamy dough.

“AAAAHHH!” Mirror Catwoman then had a real reason to scream as Selina dug her claws into her exposed breasts. She squeezed as hard as she could and on top of doing so with her claws, she twisted the hell out of those things and actually made her foe cry. With no time to relish in that, Selina just pushed forward and her copy fell over, leaving her with an opening for the final blow.

She jumped as high as she could and then dropped like a rock. Meanwhile, Mirror Catwoman had managed to lean her head and shoulders up, but upon tilting her head even further, she could only watch as two moons came crashing down on her. Just before reaching the ground, the plummeting Selina gripped her gargantuan glutes and pulled apart, leaving Mirror Catwoman’s scream to only be heard for less than two seconds before everything from her shoulders and up was swallowed up by Selina’s rosebud.

The formerly ticked off feline howled more like a bitch in heat as she reveled in having someone beneath her booty and partially inserted into her bowels. She thrashed and yelled for help, only adding to Selina’s pleasure, and even through her blubber, the double could be heard gagging from the smell, another sign that she was just a cheap knock off. Selina could have easily fed her copy to her ass given the time, but she shook off the pleasure she felt, as she refused to get any of that from the evil incarnation beneath her.

So, she grunted very loudly, producing a blaring thunder from down under. Mirror Catwoman shrieked and grabbed at Selina’s butt cheeks to try and pull herself free, but the sphincter had a vice grip on her. The fart never ceased in volume until something popped out of the ass. As her gas died down, Selina stood and looked disgusted and the sight before her. The fact that her double smelled like that and had her face coated brown wasn’t what disgusted her though, it was what she represented, and as she could only stare off into space while remaining in shock, Selina grabbed her and held her into the air.

“I DON’T NEED YOU!” Selina only grew angrier with every word. She threw her as hard as she could, abandoning every negative and selfish aspect of her past self that had almost doomed her to a life of loneliness like Bruce, and suddenly, her double struck the boundary of the darkness, and it shattered like glass.
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: Dark reflections

1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
Not everyone was facing there demons head-on and beating them. Far from everyone else, a battle between two lovers was happening, where neither one was putting their heart into. Beast Boy dodged the large rocks by running around and transforming into various animals. He avoided a rather large rock heading for his chest by turning into a squirrel and then turned into a kangaroo to jump over a round rock hurdling at his feet. He turned into dozens of animals, from mice to birds to snakes, each time just barely missing the heavy stones. He swooped between two hurdling rocks as a falcon to land on one knee on the ground in his human form. Gasping for breath he looked at Terra who hadn’t moved since the fight began.

“Terra! What are you doing? It’s me Beast Boy!”

Terra’s response was to send an even bigger rock shooting towards Beast Boy. This time he was too slow. He threw himself away from the rock, but his ankle still got hit. Tumbling onto the ground, he shakily returned to his feet and tried to confront Terra again. “If something’s controlling your mind fight it! You need to snap out of it before you do something you regret.”

“Regret?” Terra sounded broken as she spoke. She lifted her head and Beast Boy saw her sunken eyes and pasty skin. Terra trembled as ragged, harsh laugh burst from her lungs. Beast Boy winced at her laugh. There was none of the warmth or joy that he was familiar with, it sounded like broken glass grinding together. Terra stopped laughing and gave Beast Boy a huge, emotionless grin. “You idiot. All I have are regrets. Now stay still and die.”

Like Terra, the ground started to shake. Pebbles and rocks as big as Beast Boy’s fist start rising from the ground. Suddenly, Beast Boy found himself dodging a hail of stones. He managed to avoid the bigger ones, but some of the smaller stones hit home. They felt like rubber bullets when they impacted his body, sending pain shooting through his body and leaving nasty bruises. Beast Boy tried to turn into something small, a mouse, a bug, anything, but one of the bigger rocks collided with his side, shattering one of his ribs. Falling to his knees, he grabbed his side and let out a groan. Throbbing with pain, he looked uncertainly up at Terra, begging for some answers.

“You don’t get it do you?” Terra bitterly laughed, hugging her sides as she trembled even harder. “I am a mole, a traitor, a undercover agent, a two-timing, rat, a whore for hire. I was sent to spy on you by Slade. I’m the enemy!”

Beast Boy surged to his feet, racing towards Terra before she could even lift a stone off the ground. He grabbed her by the shoulders, his gaze angry and vengeful. “I don’t know who you are, but stop pretending to be Terra! She’d never do that, she’s a fun, sweet, caring girl and I love her. If you don’t stop saying these things I’ll kill you!”

“Idiot!”

A jagged rock exploded out from the ground between them, forcing Beast Boy to let go. Slowly it sank back into the ground and Beast Boy was looking at Terra, but it wasn’t the Terra he had been screaming at a moment earlier. Tears had started to pour from her eyes as she struggled to stay on her feet. Her legs gave in and she collapsed to her knees sobbing and repeating the same word over and over again.

“Idiot! Idiot! Idiot! Idiot! Idiot! Idiot! Idiot! Idiot! Idiot! Idiot!”

Beast Boy could only stare, as he slowly realized no one was controlling Terra and this wasn’t a doppelganger. At first he couldn’t believe it, but as he kept watching Terra breakdown he knew he his heart that this was the girl he loved. He shook his head, never dreaming he’d run into such a nightmare, even in Hell. He slowly started to shuffle towards Terra. His first instinct was to comfort her, even after what she had told him.

“I’m an idiot!” Terra screamed and slammed her fist into the ground. A tremor shook the cavern and Beast Boy fell back. Getting to his feet quickly, he tried to talk to Terra, even though he had no idea what to say.

“Everything’s going to be okay. Lots of people were criminals who ended up becoming heroes. Lets talk to the others, we can sort this all out. I’m just glad you told before you hurt anyone.”

“But I have hurt people! I was the one that helped Slade capture Harley, Batgirl and Poison Ivy! I’ve been feeding Deathstroke with information and secrets about all of you! I’ve been working with him for years doing terrible, terrible things. I’ve killed Gar, killed good people for money.” Terra had never thought much about her past until now. She had never felt guilty about the horrible things she’d done until she fell in love with Beast Boy. All that fat that Beast Boy had been groping before she lost it had come from her victims, men, women and even children that Slade had ordered her to make disappear. She had enjoyed their screams and begging while she ate them, but now they rung in her ears breaking her heart.

“And I forgive you! Whatever you were I can see past that. I don’t care about what you were faking, only what was true. I love you and you love me, I know it!” The conviction behind Beast Boy’s words took Terra aback. Even after telling him she was a mole, there love was true. It made Terra feel disgusted. What had she ever done to deserve such confidence and devotion? What made her so worth loving that what she really was could be ignored. She couldn’t live with Beast Boy’s love, so she knew what she had to do.

“I don’t love you. I never loved you, it was all a lie.”
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: Within Terra

1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
The look on Beast Boy’s face broke Terra’s heart. He looked like he had been stabbed in the heart and knowing it was her fault nearly killed Terra right there. Unfortunately, she was still alive, but not for long. Drawing on all her power, she started ripping the cavern apart. The ground tore open around her and the ceiling started coming down. She was going to bring everything down. It wouldn’t kill Beast Boy, he could turn into a flea and crawl through the wreckage, but she would be killed, and that was what she really wanted.

The guilt, the pain, the loss, it was too much for her. She’d die like she deserved, as a crazy super villain killed by her own powers. It would make things easier for Beast Boy. Better he feel betrayed then mourn her. Everything started to come down and Terra closed her eyes. She was ready to let go and leave this horrible world. Too bad Beast Boy wasn’t ready to let her go.

“No!” Jumping on her, he threw her back just as a huge boulder crashed down where she had been standing. They were thrown to the floor, rolling around together as Beast Boy tried to get on top of Terra. The ceiling finally collapsed, burying them both completely. The candles went out and everything was dark and silent, until an elephant exploded out of the rubble. The giant beast was there for only a second before returning to Beast Boy, who collapsed on top of an unscratched Terra.

Gasping for air, Terra dared not move. Beast Boy had covered her during the cave-in with his body, keeping her from being crushed. The irony that it was her slim body that allowed them to both survive being crushed was lost on her as what Beast Boy had done had sunk in. Carefully pushing him off her, Terra lit one of the fallen candles and nearly screamed when she saw the condition Beast Boy was in. He was bleeding all over and covered in purple bruises. His right arm was bent at an unnatural angle, either it was dislocated or broken, she couldn’t tell. He was beat up, nearly dead, all to save her.

“You stupid, stupid boy!” Crying, Terra buried her face in Beast Boy’s chest and let everything out. After what she’d done, after what she’d said, it didn’t make any sense for him to save her. She wasn’t worth it.

“Don’t…cry…”

Lifting her head, Terra stared into Beast Boy’s warm, forgiving eyes. Her lip trembled as she fought down more tears and then she hugged him. She wasn’t sure if she’d ever fully escape her past or Slade, but she would never let go again as long as she had Beast Boy.

“I love you,” she said and kissed his forehead. The fight was over, but in the end, everyone had won, especially Terra.
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: Stronger then Stone

1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
Suddenly, a loud booming was heard from beyond the chamber. Terra looked ahead as the sound grew louder, and soon she saw the walls shake. Then, the wall she stared at erupted as a deformed body came flying out of it, followed by a bright, green beam.

Terra’s eyes lit up as she saw Starfire, and then Raven flying out of the hole as they fought back damned souls. One was riding on Raven’s back and tried bite her shoulder, but she just grabbed him and then punched him to the ground. As she hovered, another of the monsters tried to jump at her, but some strong kicks from her fat legs put it down. Meanwhile, Starfire pounded her fists into abomination that came her way, and blasted them to pieces when ever they laid their decayed hands on her body. After another eye blast cleared away a whole row in front of her, Raven flew over to help her with the next hoard already on the way, but that’s when she saw him.

“Beast Boy!” shifting all of her weight over, she made a beeline for Terra and her battered lover. Hearing her own lover scream the name of a friend prompted Starfire to stop blazing through the enemies in front of her and join Raven. Soon the two were huddled around Terra and Starfire asked “Is he?”

“No, he’s alive. He’s going to make it.” That last sentence was spoken as Terra cradled him in her arms like he was baby. Seeing her hold the boy she loved so tenderly and the tears leaking from her eyes touched Starfire’s and Raven’s hearts, but then Terra shouted “Behind you!”

As the monstrous hoards tried to overwhelm our heroes, Terra’s fists glowed as she focused her power back towards one of the other walls. “Drive them back!” she said Raven and Starfire focused their blasts. Which ever ones didn’t get fried would become buried.

However, just as their blasts knocked their foes into the wall and Terra began breaking it apart, unbeknownst to them, at the same time, Batman had knocked the Joker into a wall, Catwoman threw her double into one, and at last, Robin’s future weapon had allowed him not only to shock the crap out of Slade, but he rushed forward and pushed him up against the wall, digging the baton into his stomach as the electricity crackled all around.

BOOM!!!!!!

As the dust cleared, everyone groggily got up as they found themselves in an even larger chamber than before. Looking back, they saw that the spots they had been in had all been right next to each other, just separated by walls. While everyone dusted themselves off, Raven walked over to something in the middle of the chamber.

A pit of fire, that looked as deep as it did hot. The flames nearly kissed her boots as she stood at the edge. Staring directly into the fires of hell froze Raven in dread at the thought of facing them. She wondered if her future self was already had burned in the flames below after triggering the apocalypse.

Then, Raven felt two hands on her shoulders. Turning around, she saw Robin and Starfire looking sympathetically at her. No one said a thing, they didn’t need to, and Raven just embraced them. Even in the pits of hell, feeling Starfire’s big and warm body and Robin’s strong arms around her brought her such comfort. As they rejoined the others, Batman had helped his wife up, and Terra cleared some rocks away so she could sit and lay Beast Boy’s head on her lap. Once the heroes were all present and accounted for, save for Cyborg, they soon faced the villains getting back onto their feet, unaware that dark forces watched them the whole time.

“Surrounded by everyone I hate, while in the bowels of hell for one final battle. I don’t know about you, but this is not how I wanted to spend my Sunday morning.” Joker spoke. No one laughed, wanting nothing more than to tear those smiling lips right off his face after they punched every tooth out of his mouth. First though, Catwoman stepped up and asked “Where’s Catgirl, Nightstar, and Batman?”

“Ah, those heroes from the future,” Slade began. Everyone was stunned and wondered how he knew that, and listened as he said “so they have names.” However, Joker then whispered in his ear, and through his mask, Slade grinned “They had names.”

“Ergh, you lie!” Robin said. The enraged look of the boy that had nearly beaten him did nothing to bring Slade down, enjoying this far too much “Do I?” Screaming in rage, Robin lead the charge as everyone came at the two villains. Slade launched a fire blast, which split the group down the middle. Once that happened, it guided towards Terra, but Raven shielded her and Beast Boy. After that, she came at Deathstroke while he fought off Starfire and Robin. Flying at him from the side, she knocked him away from them and delivered energy slashes to his body. He bled, and that only made her eyes glow more intensely. Raven was only getting started, and she wasn’t going to hold anything back.

Unfortunately Deathstroke saw that to and ran at her through her blasts. A scolding hot hand lashed forward to melt the fat right off her face, but a huge, orange blob took the blow as Starfire stepped in. He singed her belly, but she didn’t show the pain, only staring sternly at the man that had tried to harm her love. She then delivered a very satisfying blow to his crotch and then kicked him away, only to have Robin slam him into the ground. Slade then rose back up in his flames though, and his blasts sent everyone running.
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: The Final Battle

1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
Much like Raven with Slade, all Catwoman wanted to do was disembowel the Joker, and every slash got her that much closer. She and Batman complimented each other perfectly as they overwhelmed the Clown Prince of Crime, as he dodged a blow from her only to get hit in the ribs. He then actually stabbed the dam soul in the shoulders with two Batarangs, but after screaming in pain, Joker pulled them out, but not fast enough to stop Catwoman to embrace him. She moved swiftly, throwing herself to the ground and rolling on and off him, wanting him crushed, but not wanting to get herself stabbed. However, she did crush the weapons, but Joker still got to stab as he rushed up and a blade emerged from his shoe. He got her in the leg, but again his other foe came at him from behind. Joker was smacked against Catwoman as she kneeled down, but once he bounced back, he tried squeezing his flower in Batman’s face. However, not only did the Dark Knight crush his hand, but he ripped the flower off, stuffed in the Joker mouth, and then beat him in the jaw again.

If that wasn’t enough, a giant, stone pillar suddenly erupted from beneath his feet at a speed that sent him flying into the air. It soon vanished, and Catwoman saw a screaming Joker dropping like a rock. He would have fallen right on her, so she rolled out of the way and he landed with a sickening thud. Both she and Batman looked over at the girl responsible and Terra smiled back at them.

She then did the same thing for her teammates as Slade had kept them running. With his arms stretched out and fire coming out every second there was, he was spinning faster than humanly possible as he gave the Titans no time to fly out. If Robin ducked, he wouldn’t be singed, he’d be squashed, and if Raven or Starfire did that, their bulging bodies would get caught right in the flames. The turmoil came to an end though when Terra caused a stalactite fall. Slade had to move to get out of the way, but that let Starfire and Raven swoop in and slam right into him, sandwiching him between their bellies.

“Woohoo! Go Titans! Ow.”
“Shush, you need to save your strength.”
Terra stroked his battered body, but the fact that he was still keeping his spirits high just made her love him even more. Plus, she had to admit, the fight was really cheer worthy. For once, things seemed even as the trials of hell had been bested by these strong heroes and the villains now seemed like they could fall. Terra really got a kick as she saw both Robin and Batman aim and fire their grappling hooks into the backs of their opponents, and then pull and slam them into each other!

“Like father like son.” Terra joked. However her smile faded when she saw that not only that Joker and Deathstroke get back up from that, but also when she heard the Joker say “All this just so you can all get your hands back on Harley? No deal, I’ve seen what you do with your hands. Besides, I don’t think you want to see her now. In my defense, all I did was just smile.” Joker giggled ominously, and everyone both tried and dared not imagine what else he had done to either Harley or Barbara. Since fist fighting wasn’t working so well, Joker went back to doing what he did best; psychological warfare. He was counting on it breaking more psyches, but the only thing that was broken was two more of his ribs by a flying stone.

Setting Beast Boy down, Terra yelled in rage and charged at the demented clown. She leaped into the air and brought up a heavy boulder not to ride on, but one she slammed down right in the Joker’s face. As he fell, she landed on top of him and pounded him again and again with the jagged rock, and showed him just what the price was for manipulating someone. Soon though, Robin tagged her out and let her get back to protecting Beast Boy, and since the Joker’s words enraged him just as much. He landed a few blows, but then Joker kicked him off and suddenly got a little help from his demonic friends as a giant flame thrower appeared on him!

Once more, Robin was sent running as the laughing clown tried to fillet him. When streams of fire went flying out of that thing, smaller bursts that the Joker could directly aim like bullets came next, and Robin ran for his life. Soon though, Raven and Starfire were able to break away from battling Slade to help him, but Joker then began firing wildly at them. As they erratically flew out of the way, Robin tried to draw the fire so they could rush at Joker like they did Slade, but once he swung in on his grapple, he drew fire in the wrong spot as Joker immediately burned the string off the hook. Robin fell right into Raven, which knocked her into Starfire, and they all hit their heads on the stone wall and rolled into a ditch beneath the old caverns.

Robin, having the most padding to cushion his fall, managed to get back up, but forgetting about the approaching danger, couldn’t help but look at the girls beneath him. They were still coming around, and Robin couldn’t help but stroke their cheeks with his gloved hands. Here they were, trapped in hell and up against two of the most evil villains ever, and despite all that, all they could think about was protecting him. Slade was wrong, he did know what true love was; they had showed him.

Joker was just about to aim and fire in the ditch when a pissed off Robin flew at him.
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: Good VS. Evil

choices: Enough with the fist fights; give us some vore!
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
While that was going on though, Batman and Catwoman had their skills put to the ultimate test against Deathstroke the Terminator. Every blow they took broke something, but they dealt back twice as much. They weren’t just fighting for themselves or the others, they fought for the memories of their future offspring. Batman hadn’t shown it before, but every blow he laid on Slade, all he saw was Carry’s face. However, he let the mother get in most of the hits.

“You’ll pay for what you did to my daughter! And our son!” Catwoman roared. In her eyes, the man she was fighting was the definition of evil. This had to have been his plan all along. Her daughter had come back to save the world like a real hero, and just when Selina was starting to get to know her, she was slaughtered like an animal. On top of that, he’d been messing with Tim’s head all this time. Well, he may be keeping her and Batman on their toes, but Deathstroke was finding out the hard way what happens when you mess with her kittens.

Robin back flipped constantly as Joker fired at him. Once and a while, Robin would toss a Birdarang to try and get the tank on Joker’s back, but he kept on missing. Finally, Joker shot near his foot and the blast knocked Robin on his side. As he skidded to a stop, Joker stood before him.

“Oh wise up junior; game’s over!” he told him, but Robin refused to accept that. Much like his future self told him, he had far too much to live for now.

“No, I’m not giving up. Too many people are counting on me, and I’m fighting for every one of them.” He said, to which the Joker just looked bored and said “Is this the long version?” Then though, Robin said “You and Slade think I’m just a bad joke; that I’ve lost sight of what justice or love really means, and that I don’t deserve to wear this mask. Well, I don’t care what you think, *WHAM!*”

Robin’s plan of boring the Joker had worked as he punched the clown for everyone he’d ever hurt. As he forced him to move back towards the fire pit, Robin told him “I am a hero *Wham!* I am a leader *Wham!* I AM A MAN! *WHAM!*”

“Bullshit!” Joker finally yelled back, and at point blank, he blasted Robin right into the wall! The Joker did a happy victory dance while everyone else screamed for Robin. However, Joker’s smile immediately dropped when he watched come running out of the flames, in a Batman suit!!!

Everyone gasped as they saw him. The tights were a darker grey than Bruce’s, and the ears on the cowl were a little shorter. There was no yellow oval around the bat, and the belt was more angular in its curvature. Of course, Tim looked bad ass in that suit.

“No, no, NO!!!” Joker refused to accept this and fired. The new Batman however just leaped into the air and with one throw, sunk a Batarang right into the gas, and it exploded. While Joker came stumbling out of the blast though, Tim dove right at Slade and kicked him so hard in the face, half of his cracked mask fell off.

Joker wobbled around the rim of the pit like a drunk, but was soon tapped on the shoulder. He turned around, and Batman delivered the final punch, knocking the dead clown in the fire below “AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!”

Meanwhile, Robin judo flipped Slade over to everyone for one final blow.
Catwoman slashed at his stomach.
Starfire blasted his a Starbolt.
Raven’s powers ripped up the ground beneath him and Terra battered him with each stone.
Even Beast Boy got up to turn into a ram and knock him back.
Batman didn’t interfere though, giving his time to Tim, who held Slade by the scruff of his shirt.

“You’re going to kill me? I knew I was right about you.” He sneered as blood trickled down his chin. Tim however just told him right in his face “I don’t kill. Everyone eaten, they’ll be back when their sentence is up, but you, your soul is already damned.” And with that, Robin tossed the battered villain to the ground. He wasn't going anywhere.

“So, are you like magic now?” Beast Boy asked, still having no idea how being set ablaze gives you a batsuit. Robin pulled back the cowl, revealing he still had his mask on beneath it and said “Pretty sure this was a one time thing…but I’m keeping the suit.”

Right on que, Starfire and Raven draped their soft and flabby selves on Tim’s hard and chiseled body. He already had a physique any guy would want, but in this suit, he looked even buffer, and they couldn’t wait to ‘celebrate’ on saving the world.
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: A hero rises from the ashes

choices: Harley is hidden inside Barbara's fat
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
“Hehehe. I love to see you heroes celebrating when you accomplish nothing. You’ve already lost and you don’t even know it, hilarious.”

If looks could kill, the hateful stares that the beaten and bleeding super villain Slade was getting would have vaporized his whole body. Tim kneeled down, grabbing Slade by the front of his shirt and lifted him up. In his deepest, most frightening voice he barked, “It’s over Slade, good has won! Now tell us where Batgirl and Harley are before I really bring the pain!”

“You heroes and your tired clichés,” Slade dryly chuckled and Tim’s grip tightened. He lifted his fist over his head menacingly, but it had no effect on Slade. The assassin stared hard at Tim with his one eye without any sign of fear or concern. Tim thought he’d have to start using the techniques Batman had taught him in private to get perps to talk, when Slade gave out an annoyed sigh. “This is pointless. If my employers haven’t finished yet, then they deserve to fail. Come, I’ll take you to them.”

Tim looked at Slade doubtfully, not trusting the killer to go along so easily. He looked at everyone else, seeing that they shared his doubts. Slade was giving in way too easily. Even though they had him at their mercy, no one expected him to crack so quickly. Something about his words made Tim feel uneasy. Something was very wrong but he didn’t know what. Without having any choice, Tim let go of Slade and let him get back to his feet.
Tim jabbed his finger into Slade’s chest. “You try anything and….”

“You’ll beat me, hang me upside down, feed me to your girlfriend, fart on me, threats are so beneath you Robin, I don’t know why you even bother.”

Tim’s mouth formed a scowl as he pushed Slade forward and he began leading everyone further into the tunnels of Hell. Starfire and Raven stuck close behind Tim, ready to lend a hand if Slade tried anything. Batman and Catwoman were close behind too, ready to help if needed. Terra walked far behind everyone, helping the still injured Beast Boy. She was keeping her head down to avoid looking at Slade. Silently they walked for only a few minutes before Slade stopped in front of a large wooden door.

“Here we are,” Slade said, taking a step back, but getting grabbed by Tim before he could move any further. Tim narrowed his eyes, finding it too convenient that his friends were being kept so close to where the fight was taking place. This wasn’t a video game, the princess wasn’t in the next room after the big boss.

“You doubt me,” Slade said, not asking a question, just stating a fact. He laughed cruelly, amused by the ignorance he saw around him. “You know nothing of Hell. All space is relative here. The distance between places is only judged by the reality you can comprehend. We could have traveled a hundred miles in a few steps or gone back to where you began. You were lucky that you didn’t throw me into Pit or you would have wandered the hallways of Hell forever.”

“Shut up and open the door,” Tim coldly ordered and stepped back. That bad feeling he had gotten when Slade first complied had gotten stronger. Catching his mentor’s eye, Tim saw that he wasn’t the only one with an unsettling feeling. Something was very wrong and he couldn’t help but feel that once Slade opened that door the real nightmare would begin. Without realizing it, Tim grabbed Starfire and Raven’s fat hands and held them tightly. Slade opened the door and everyone peered in.

Slurp! Gurgle! Gulp!

The room was the size of a football field, but it looked tiny when everyone saw the mound of rolls of fat jiggling in the middle of the room. It didn’t look human. It was fifty feet wide with tiny hands on either side of its bulbous mass and a face that was just a huge, open mouth. Big, round breasts were being squished between the rolls of fat on the chin and the belly. No one could see any legs, only dropping fat from the front and back. Wet eating noises groaned from it as it wobbled on the floor; drool running down a hundred rolls of fat. Flesh sagged to the ground, smacking into more flesh as everything jiggled. It wobbled around, a slug like thing with no discernible feature, until the worlds greatest detective spotted a tiny patch of red hair on the top.

“Dear God. It’s Barbara,” Batman said in a weak, horrified voice. Even the Dark Knight was disgusted and horrified by this living blob of almost nothing but fat. There was nothing attractive about it, nothing you wanted to touch, just a blob of fat without anything human about it. Everyone recoiled back, unable to imagine the sweet Batgirl had been turned into this fat, mindless slug. Everyone, but Slade, who chuckled softly at the madness he had caused.
“So this was the big plan? Create an even bigger fattie? How pathetic.”

“Look brother, the little human doesn’t get it. How sad,” A sickly sweet voice sang out from above the giant blob that had once been Barbara Gordon. In a swirl of fire, the demon’s Romeo and Juliet appeared, smiling down at the shocked heroes. Under Juliet’s arm, she carried the Urn of Gluttony, which was surrounded by a golden glow. The demon’s lowered themselves to the ground in front of what they had created. Pushing past Slade, Tim ran at the pair, rage overcoming anything else he might be feeling.

“WHAT DID YOU DO TO HER!!!”

The energy shield surrounded the siblings and Tim came to a screeching halt. Practically foaming at the mouth, he breathed deeply as the anger coursed through him. Barbara wasn’t just his friend, she was the first woman he had ever loved but physically and emotionally. She was one of the few people he considered family and cared for more then anyone. He had fought, learned and screwed beside her and now she had been turned into this. Tim was ready to kill someone.

“Temper, temper, don’t you want to hear our brilliant plan?” Romeo teased, waving his finger in the air. Robin snarled and slammed his fists against the shield making it crackle with infernal energy. Everyone else had their weapon’s ready or powers activated in preparation to fight the two succubuses. They looked happily at the heroes, cooing with delight at the suffering and pain their actions had caused.

“I suppose we’ll keep our reasons to ourselves. No one appreciates a good evil plan,” Juliet sighed before grinning maliciously. “Still you’d be interested to know that your friend’s new size is all due to our generous all-you-can-eat soul buffet. We’ve fed her thousands of souls, her and the other one. Brother dear, what did happen to the blond one?”

“Harley,” Tim gasped. The sight of Barbara covered with more fat then the whole FJL combined had distracted him from the other person they had come to rescue. She was nowhere in sight. Narrowing his eyes at the demons, he growled, “Where is she?”
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: Enough with the fist fights; give us some vore!

1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
Tapping her chin, Juliet put on a mock thinking expression to further frustrate Tim before she finally spoke up. “Let me think. I believe that during the feeding frenzy the redhead human fell on top of the blond human and never removed herself from on top of her. Poor thing, your blond human couldn’t keep up with her friend. I had such high hopes that she would become the biggest after seeing her eat her true love. I guess her eyes were just bigger then her stomach.”

Chuckling softly, the cold, calculating eyes of the demon Juliet turned to the blob that she had created. She looked at her creation with fondness, the sight of what she’d done touching her cold dead heart. She purred as she spoke to Barbara, the urn glowing brighter as she issues her command. “Deary, would you mind grabbing your friend. I think she’s stuck between your tenth and length fold of ass fat.”

A wet, rumbling gurgle came from the open maw of Batgirl as her belly fat started to ripple. Loud smacking sounds echoed in the huge chamber as the fat jiggled. With a grunt, the mountain of blubber thrust forward and out of the many folds a wet, naked form came slipping out. Everyone gasped at the sight of Harley. She was twice as big as the last time they saw her, but lying next to the blimp sized Barbara she looked tiny. Her huge ass stuck in the air as she laid face down on the ground on her queen sized bed belly. Sweat covered every inch of her body and she was suffering from heat stroke after spending hours in the tight, cramped rolls of her lover’s fat. Tim wanted to run towards her, but Raven and Starfire grabbed him before he could move. They saw that he wasn’t the only one paying attention to Harley.

“Looks like our pet wants to eat that crumb that was stuck to her. Go ahead dear, gobble her up!” Romeo’s eyes glowed bright red and he held his sister tightly against his chest. Barbara let out a gurgling cry and started leaning forward. With arms that were nothing more but hands on her bloated side, Barbara brought her face towards the smaller fat woman and opened her mouth even wider. Everyone watched in horror as her mouth kept widening until a semi-truck could drive down her throat. Her open mouth loomed over Harley who remained semi-comatose. She was helpless in her current state, not that being awake would have increased her chances of surviving.

“No,” Batman growled, clearing his head from the horror and revulsion to help one of his lovers. He threw his grappling hook around Harley’s ankle, hoping desperately to pull her out of harms way, but as he pulled Romeo flicked his wrist and the line was cut. Batman let go of the line. It was too late.

With a wet slurp, Barbara sucked the eight hundred pound former villain into her maw half way. Her lips closed over her bloated midsection and lifted up, carrying the fat clown high into the air. Harley’s ass jiggled next to Barbara’s lips as her legs weakly kicked around. Harley was big enough to burst any normal FJL woman’s belly wide open, but for Barbara she was just a mouthful. Undulating fat wobbled as Barbara moved, slurping in her one love like a piece of cake. With all the bulges on her body no one could tell if her cheeks were packed full of Harley’s fat body. With a sickly gulp, Barbara swallowed Harley in one gulp. Her portly body was squeezed down her throat, massaging all the rolls and bulges at once. She would add a few hundred pounds to Barbara, but that was only a drop in the water compared to how much she weighed now. A satisfied gurgle came from Barbara as she returned to her immobile, mindless state.

“Wonderful! Wonderful! Wonderful!” Romeo cried as Juliet clapped her hands. Everyone watched in horror as they lost a dear friend. Poison Ivy had told them the resurrection spell Zatanna cast was gone and once digested Harley would be gone forever. Tim and Batman didn’t often see eye to eye about everything, but as they both realized that they had once again lost someone dear to them, they made the exact same promise. They would get justice for Harley, for everyone these two hurt. There was going to be a reckoning and Romeo and Juliet were going to suffer for what they’d done.

“It’s time! It’s time, brother! I feel it!” Juliet moaned as she ran her hands lustfully over her body. Falling against Romeo’s chest she softly told him, “Set our pet free.”

“At once my sister!” Romeo screamed and took the Urn of Gluttony from his sister. Lifting the glowing artifact high into the air, he threw it to the ground. It shattered on impact, an explosion of light burst out of it. The evil siblings started laughing as Barbara started trembling and let out a scream. Her subdued, mindless state creased and she looked at her friends below her. There was a shining moment of hope that Barbara had regained control, but that hope shattered like the urn when Barbara roared a single word.
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: Barbara Blob

1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
“EAT!”

Opening her mouth, Barbara started breathing in and continued breathing in and continued and continued until a swirling vortex formed. Everything started to be sucked into her gapping maw and quickly the heroes found themselves being pulled towards her mouth too.

“Swallow them! Swallow everything!” Juliet and Romeo screamed together as they vanished in flames like they appeared. The vortex from Barbara’s mouth continued to pull them all in. They couldn’t get away from it and soon Barbara pulled in her first meal. If there was any justice in this world it happened now because the first person to be sucked in was Slade, the very person that caused all this. The mercenary was lifted off the ground and went flying towards the mouth. In his last moments, he said nothing nor fought back. In fact, he almost seemed happy as he disappeared down Barbara’s throat.

“No! No! No! No! No!” Terra screamed over and over again. She was trying to form a stone wall around her to keep from being sucked in, but she was too slow. Beast Boy, the only hero unable to fight back was ripped from her arms and pulled towards the open mouth. Terra grabbed his hand, but was quickly losing her grip. Beast Boy was going to be swallowed. Just before she lost her grip, she threw herself forward, grabbing Beast Boy as they were sucked into Barbara’s mouth. Beast Boy gasped as he felt Terra hold him as they flew towards certain doom. There was a smile on Terra’s face as she disappeared with Beast Boy into Barbara. In the end, she was still going to be with Beast Boy.

“Nooooooo! Beast Boy! Terra!” Tim screamed as Raven and Starfire held him down. Two more friends lost forever, it was almost too much for him to handle. Raven and Starfire used their size and strength to keep from being pulled in, but they knew it was a losing battle. They couldn’t escape the pull and it was only enviable that they’d join their friends. Closing their eyes, they embraced one last time as the family they had become.
That’s when the man in the two piece suit with flaming orange hair and white, glowing angel wings appeared behind them and placed his hands on either girl. At that moment, Tim felt himself being teleported away. The last thing he saw in Hell was his mentor cradling the woman he loved as they were pulled into Barbara’s mouth.

“I always wanted to die in your arms,” Catwoman purred as she shared one last playful smile with her Dark Knight, and then, without even a gulp, Batman and Catwoman joined the fallen inside Barbara’s belly.




Tim, Raven and Starfire landed with a splat on the grounds right outside the entrance to Hell. The man with the angel wings floated behind them, looking uncaringly down at the heroes. Tim rose to his feet first, swaying unsteadily and then lunging at the winged man.

“Why didn’t you save him!?”

His fist connected squarely with the man’s chest, but he gave no reaction. He didn’t even move as Tim hit him, remaining a few feet above ground as Tim gasped for air and silently wept. He had lost friends, lovers and the man he considered a father all in the past few minutes. He wanted to collapse, but the cold, uncaring words said next by the man that had saved him and his girls reawaken his fury.

“I didn’t save him because he didn’t matter. I only teleported you out by accident. I was only trying to get ‘her’ out, you were brought along because you were so close to her,” the man explained in a simple, calm voice that really pissed Tim off. He glared at the man, who remained passive to the hostility. Slowly the winged man rose into the sky, surveying the three remaining heroes. “I will leave you now. I only saved ‘her’ so ‘she’ could end this madness. Do not expect Lucifer Morningstar to come to your assistance again.”

Lucifer disappeared, leaving Tim to collapse to his knees. Starfire ran towards him to see if he was hurt, while Raven stared blankly at where the Fallen One had vanished. One of the underworlds greatest monsters, even worse then her father had saved her and her lovers. She didn’t know how to feel about that. Also, what did he mean by when he said 'she' could end this madness’? Did something about her heritage hold the clue to saving everyone?

“Raven.” Turning, Raven saw Tim holding his right hand. “Do you know any healing spells? I think every bone in my hand is broken from punching that jerk.”
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: Dying Like Animals

1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
Her hands glowed as she held Robin’s palm. He waited patiently as he let her work her magic, as did Starfire. However, as she finished up, everyone had been pondering the obvious and Robin finally asked about it “Raven, was that really…him?”

“Yes. I know how crazy it sounds, but Lucifer, the first fallen and lord of all darkness, just saved our lives.” She spoke in her normal raspy voice, with no shock from the insaneness of the situation, because the three of them knew it was the truth. What they didn’t know of course was why it happened.

“But why? Why would the devil himself save us?” Robin asked. If the soul cause of pain and suffering on Earth and everywhere else saved you from being killed by a plan hatched by some of his followers, than you know something is wrong. No one could trust a demon, especially after everything that had just happened, but while her lovers were scratching their heads around the puzzle at hand, Starfire was the one to remember what they had overlooked.

“He never intended to save all of us. Remember? He said we only escaped by being close to ‘her’.” She said. Now, both her and Robin’s eyes fell on Raven, with the latter asking the obvious “Did he mean you?”

“That’d be my guess, but I have no idea why he would think I could stop all this.” Raven stepped over the side, growing even more unsure of herself with each spoken word. How was she supposed to fix everything? Her friends were dead, and now those two Succubi had the hungriest human on the face of the Earth at their disposal. Plus, she couldn’t forget that in another timeline she had already tried to save everyone and wound causing the apocalypse!

“Well,” Raven turned to her true loves and upon looking into their eyes, despite the fact that she knew that the three of them were all equally clueless, she was at least comforted by the fact that they’d help her figure out what ever it was she was supposed to do. Robin then pointed out “the urn is gone now. Maybe-“

Suddenly, the whole ground began to shake. People who had just walked onto the street began to fall as a massive tremor began to shake San Francisco. Raven and Starfire floated into the air to avoid that, and carried Robin up with them. “We need to get higher!” he told them. That’d keep them safe and they could see where they were needed. At once, his girlfriends flew into the air along with him, up above the towering buildings, and what they soon saw terrified them more than a quaking city.

Rising up from the bay was a massive form, more blubbery than any whale. As the water fell from the top, the fears of our heroes were confirmed as they saw that it was Barbara the Blob. A sick smile was plastered on her fat face as she continued to reveal herself to the city. Her very emergence caused giant waves to radiate from all around its round body, and soon that fast moving water hit the Golden Gate and Bay Bridges like a ton of bricks. The roads were torn away and cars fell over into the ocean. The people floated to the top, but the only thing everyone else noticed floating was Barbara, now a massive ocean liner of cellulite. She even rode the waves towards the city! Licking her lips, she said “I’m still hungry.”

People ran for their lives as the blob came right at them, tearing up the streets with her mass and weight, and that combined with the wave plowed through buildings and they fell like dominos. At last Barbara came to reside deep in the city, but by that time, Robin, Raven, and Starfire had moved to a rooftop much further away. They knew things were only going to get worse; Barbara was fifty feet wide and tall as a house, meaning there was plenty of space for her to fill with the citizens below.

Now with her giant ass firmly seated and with fresh food all around her, Barbara started breathing in deeply and a water spout began sucking in everything around her. People screamed as they swirled in the spiral of liquid before being washed down her gullet and no one was safe. Finally, Robin placed his fingers to his ear and used his FJL communicator and proclaimed “Watcher Tower, Omega Level Alert!”

In the blink of an eye, every single member of the Fat Justice League and beyond was teleported to San Francisco, no doubt stuffed with aliens. Omega Level Alerts were only saved for the biggest kinds of emergency, and everyone could agree this was easily that big. If Barbara wasn’t stopped, she could devour all life on the planet.

“Batgirl’s been turned into that blob. All she can think of is eating, and this city’s just the appetizer. We have to stop her…by any means necessary.” Robin informed the group. His final statement stunned everyone, but Robin meant every word. He had already lost so much because of what Barbara had been turned into, and he didn’t want to lose her either, but their first priority was to save the city. Wonder Woman wanted to know more about how this had happened and why the boy wonder was so distraught, but as leader of the FJL, she had to assume command of the situation.

“Lantern, Flash, J’onn, Star Girl, Starfire, you get as many people out of the city as you can. I’m afraid it’s going to take the rest of us to stop her.” She said. Truthfully, Wonder Woman was unsure if they could win this. For over a year now, she had seen how devouring criminals had done so much good for the world, but now, seeing Batgirl turned into this monstrous blob, a gross perversion of Zatanna’s initial dream left her as horrified as she was disgusted. Still, she wasn’t as troubled Robin and before everyone leaped into battle, she told them “Stop her, but don’t hurt her if you can avoid it.”

“Let me handle this.” Supergirl suddenly spoke before flying off. The nearly naked super heroine headed straight for Barbara, figuring one light tap on the head would knock the blob out. "Sorry Babs" still, she really didn't want to hurt her best friend/former girlfriend, but she knew it had to be done. Besides, beating her would not only get everyone off her back for getting a tad carried away at the party, and the faster she beat Barbara, the faster she could start screwing her. Next to Giganta, no one had been bigger than Supergirl until now, and ignoring the thousands of people in jeopardy, Barbara right now was the hottest thing Kara had ever seen.
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: Tokyo has Godzilla, San Francisco has Batgirl

1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
Giving out a battle cry as she flew for a better show, Supergril headed right for the fat head with her fists held out. All she had to do was slow down right before they impacted so as to not shatter Barbara’s skull…at least, that was the plan. Instead, Kara’s battle cry turned into a scream for help as her slowed pace caused her legs and then the rest of her to get caught in the water spout and sucked right into the maw of the blob.

*GLOMP!*

The league saw it, but they couldn’t believe it; someone was actually eating Supergirl! As her humongous legs kicked outside the monster’s mouth though, Livewire naturally stepped in to save her, with the rest of the league soon following her, along with the three Titans.

They all fired at Barbara, hoping they’d make her cough up her lunch, but they remained stunned as every energy blast or punch just made her fat ripple and all the water now inside her slosh. The fact that the battlefield was now dry gave a better mindset to Livewire, who wasn’t easily distraught though, even as the belly she was running up absorbed her lightning just like so many souls. She actually used her blasts to launch her rotund form into the air, up and over the boobs to get at Supergirl.

Barbara suckled and slurped on the gargantuan form of her best friend, always dreaming of doing this. Her massive tongue lapped at massive knockers as she gnawed on her engorged gut. Like Harley, there was much to taste in this snack, but she was far too hungry to leave her in her mouth for very long. Just as her lips wrapped around oversized medicine ball buns and dragged her screaming meal in with her teeth, Livewire showed up and grabbed Supergirl’s legs before giving a tug, but two seconds later, she was lurched forward as the two of them were slurped down Barbara’s gullet.

After another failed blast from the side, Raven gasped as she watched two more people die so Batgirl could eat. She had single handedly swallowed someone nearly as strong as Superman! Speaking of whom, he was desperately trying to lift Barbara up and out of the city, but his hands, along with most of him actually sank into her flab like it was quicksand! Soon he was nowhere to be seen.

Then, Red Tornado flew in and formed his own vortex to cancel out Batgirl’s. It worked and at first it seemed like Barbara was out of breath, but that was only a ruse to get him closer, and when he did, her head lurched forward and she chomped him! The crunch of circuits and metal was heard before she spit them out, and without one scratch in her mouth. Aside from being too big to feel any of the attacks through her blubber, Raven guessed that the Urn of Gluttony had also made her insides stronger, since otherwise someone would have blasted out of her, which again begged the question; how was she supposed to change that?!

“Zatanna! Your revival spell is gone! Cast it again before she digests them!” Robin shouted. While he was trying to pull out Vixen, who had charged right at Barbara’s belly like a rhino, the magician in question was about to cast the spell, when the gust picked her up as well. Robin abandoned Vixen before her lower half squirmed for the last time and she was swallowed by the oozing fat. Robin meanwhile fired his grapple up and around Zatanna’s leg, but that only sent him up in the air with her! Fortunately, Raven was able to encompass them in her energy and pulled as hard as she could, but it didn’t seem to be enough as the starving giant kept on sucking more air in. Finally, her focus was broken when Huntress knocked into her and the three heroes headed straight for the open maw. With one more shot, Raven was able to pull Robin free, but she wasn’t fast enough to save Zatanna or Huntress from being swallowed “NO!”

Hawkgirl also tried an assault on the side of the belly and slammed her mace again and again into it, but it only rumbled, and that was from hunger. “Mmm, chicken!” Shayera became horrified as she looked up to see Barbara turn her head an inhale. She stood no chance and soon she was sloshed around in her maw before adding to the blob’s bulging body, with Barbara hiccupping a few feathers before feasting once more.

Black Canary shrieked and finally someone was able to harm Barbara as her ear drums stood no chance. However, rather than scream in pain, Barbara just sucked in even harder and bit down on her prey! There was no blood, but Canary’s hippo hips were tenderized before she was guzzled down.

Wonder Woman then was finally able to step in, flying high above Barbara and tossing down her Lasso of Truth. If anything was ensnared by that thing, Batgirl would be forced to fully realize the horrors she had inflicted, but it was better than her eating everyone. Unfortunately, once more the blob picked her next snack wisely, and clamped her teeth down on the lasso before slurping it down like a piece of spaghetti. Wonder Woman was forced to let go, but fortunately Giganta was right behind.

With situation to dire even for a buffet joke, Giganta tried to succeed where Superman had failed and attempted to just remove Barbara from everyone. Her efforts were doomed from the start though, as Barbara inhaled and caught everyone off guard as she engulfed Giganta’s entire hand!

The giantess screamed as all of her began to vanish so swiftly into Barbara’s mouth, which now formed her entire head! Everyone’s worst fears were realized as Barbara grew with every gulp, but while she swooned over such a fat meal “MMMMMMMMM!!!” the FJL was there to make sure she went on a diet. Wonder Woman managed to grab Giganta’s flailing legs as the others grabbed her by the hips and tugged with all their might. With every pull though, Barbara gave out twice as much force as more of the round giantess entered her belly. Every inch of her body grew wider and wider and she rose into the air, soon towering over every building in the city! She chewed on every ounce of doughy fat savagely, and the sound of screaming in her belly gave her such pleasure. She groaned with her mouth full as she felt herself expanding so much and soon her cum had the streets flooded once more. After downing the tiny looking butt of her food, the little snacks finally gave in and let go, but not before downing the last of such a huge meal, gave Barbara some serious gas.
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: Supermeal

1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
“BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!” it shattered every window in the city and the force was more intense than anything the devoured heroes had gone through. Everyone and everything went flying, and Wonder Woman got an SUV hitting right in the head. By the time it was over, not one hero was conscious. Licking her lips, the now engorged, but still voracious Barbara, heard her solid tummy rumble and continued her snack.

Wonder Woman, Dr. Light, Dr. Fate, Tala, Steel, Killer Frost, Ice, Fire, Volcana, The Atom, Wonder Woman, all of them were being devoured. The small part of Barbara’s mind not fully focused on eating reveled in feeling them sliding down her gullet and into her hungry tummy. Still, despite the countless numbers now filling her up, Barbara that no matter how much she stuffed herself, feeling her belly swell to hold the load only wet her appetite further. This meant that even with everyone here was gone and digested, she’d have to eat twice as much next time. That was fine with her, especially when she saw Robin and his girlfriend heading her way.

Back on the rescue side of things, those heroes had gotten almost everyone that was left across the bay, and looking back, Starfire became horrified as she saw the beast that was Batgirl still eating and now dwarfed anything in the city. It was as if a giant, pink dome was encompassing everything, and this one wanted everyone to live inside her. Star wasted no words and flew back to save her lovers. The others could handle the crowd, but she was not about to lose the ones she cared about as well.

“We cannot stop her, she’s just too…fat.” Starfire said as she flew. It was true, Barbara’s size left physical attacks useless and the bigger she got, the hungrier she’d become. However, realizing this made Starfire’s eyes light up as she not only remembered that her sister was also too big, and just like that, she knew how to save the day.
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: It has to be done

choices: Things become even more sour as Barbara eats Starfire
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.content:
“Gulp! Gulp! Gulp! Gulp!” down, down they went, hidden from the world by Barbara’s mass.
