Batman’s explanation did nothing to comfort Catwoman. After a couple months of doing everything to get pregnant, the married couple went to see a doctor to check if something was wrong. The FJL did many tests on its members, but there were certain things they never checked for. They got the results from the doctor and they were bad. They went to several other doctors, but got the same results. Growing desperate, they turned to magic and alien technology, but none of that helped them. Today, they had finally accepted that it was untreatable and they would just have to live with it somehow.

“I bet it was Wonder Woman. Carry was so strong and confident, just like her.”

Batman looked at Catwoman, surprised to find her not saying that bitterly or with anger. She actually sounded wistful and was smiling slightly. The last few days had been tough, his wife had become distant and they even spent a few nights sleeping in separate beds. She would cry on his shoulder and call herself ‘barren’ and ‘empty’, and he’d speak calmly to her until she stopped crying. Catwoman had really wanted to be a mother and the knowledge that it was never going to happen hit her even harder then it did him. He wanted to help her, but under the advice of Catwoman’s female friends he was told that she needed to deal with this on her own. All he had to do was keep supporting her and being the loving husband she knew.

Catwoman spent a moment in silence, collecting her thoughts before turning to her husband. For the first time in awhile, she looked good and happy. “You want to know something funny. A year ago I’d be scared to death that you’d leave me after finding out I couldn’t give you children, but I know with all my heart now that you would never do that. When we first turned our cat and mouse game into a relationship, I thought it was sex and comfort you wanted. It took me much longer then it should have to see that you truly love me. I can live with the idea that I’ll never give birth to a child, but the thought of losing you would be too much. If you’re there for me, I know I’ll get through this.”

“I’ll always be there for you. Nothing matters to me, but that we stay together,” Bruce spoke in such a happy, loving voice it was impossible to imagine that same tongue could spew out the dark threats of Batman. He hugged his fat wife, not squeezing her until he sank into her fat, not rubbing his body against hers, but a heartfelt, sweet hug. Catwoman closed her eyes and sniffed a few times, fighting down more tears. She had cried too much. She’d never completely get over what she’d lost which she never really had. She would always wonder if things had been different, but she wasn’t going to let that keep her from enjoying life. She was Catwoman, not Kittengirl. She’d make it through, with Bruce, plus something else she had thought up last night.

“You know, I’ve been thinking,” Catwoman mused as she broke her hug with Batman, but kept him close. Holding onto his shoulders, she tried to look innocent as she spoke. “While I can’t have a child, there are plenty of other women out there that want children but don’t have men. I was just thinking, you would make a great father and I know how much you love the process of making children.”

“Selina,” Batman said wearily, not liking where this was going.

“All I’m saying is that you can knock up a few women, starting with our favourite Amazon hottie and give the world a new generation of second generation heroes. It’ll be great for everyone. You and the mother can help raise him, but you’ll have auntie Selina around to help. I’ll help raise the girls and teach them how to get the boys, and I’ll help raise the boys to seduce the girls. Maybe I’ll even pop a few of their cherries. I may not be able to become a mother, but I’ll be damned if I don’t get to raise some children.”

There was decisiveness in her words that Bruce could tell meant that this decision was out of his hands. His wife wanted to raise a child and she’d get that if he made a few illegitimate children that they helped raise with the biological mothers. The more he thought about it, the more he realized that doing this wouldn’t be such a bad thing. He did want to be a father and his wife was telling him to do it. This was not the craziest thing his wife had ever suggested.

“We’ll come up with a list of probable mommies tomorrow morning, right now lets gets some rest.” Nodding, Selina crawled under the covers of their bed with Bruce for a good nights sleep. She held onto him lightly, enjoying the comfort he gave her. Everything would turn out fine, not the way she imagined it, but fine nonetheless. That night they slept together not just as Catwoman and Batman, but Selina Kyle Wayne and Bruce Wayne as well. In the end, there was really no big difference.

The figure that entered the secret hideout was bruised, bleeding and broken, but he showed none of it. He walked with the same refinement and power he always showed. He ripped off his mask, revealing the old one-eyed man that had been hidden underneath. Slade was in pain, but he refused to show it.

Television screens covered the walls of his safe house, all praising the Fat Justice League for saving their friend and defeating the bad guys. Slade sneered at their shortsightedness. Only he knew what had really gone on behind the scenes.

Right now, all he wanted to do was rest, but he had one last thing to do before he could finally let his guard down. It was last thing he had to do to get his mission over with and it was the most dangerous. Unlike his other battles, Slade couldn’t predict this man, if you could call him a man at all. Everything might go south any second so he prepared to flee at a moments notice. Just like they agreed, he was in his safe house, sitting on his couch and, as if to show how much of a scheming bastard he was, sipping wine out of a goblet like a king.

“Lucifer,” Slade greeted, sitting across from the Prince of Lies as he drank his wine. The well-dressed man with hair like flames greeted the assassin with a nod. There was no need for pleasantries so Slade got down to business right away. “I did everything you told me, I accepted the job Romeo and Juliet offered, I played my part as their lapdog while keeping you informed, I even helped you get Poison Ivy out of Hell without anyone noticing. I don’t care that you let me get eaten, I’m too much of a professional to think I wasn’t disposable. All that matters to me is that you come through on your end. Is it done?”

“It’s done,” Lucifer told him in a jaded tone at what he found was a pretentious question. “Tomorrow morning your son Jericho will wake up and be able to speak again. They’ll say it’s a miracle and no one will know your involvement.”

“Good,” was all Slade said and that was enough. As soon as he had confirmation, he slumped forward, seemingly aging several decades. He had finally made up for his one mistake. Years ago an enemy of his slit his son’s throat, rendering him mute. Science hadn’t been able to help and magic didn’t seem to be able to help either. Turns out he needed a different kind of magic to fix the damage.

“Yes, you got what you wanted, and you didn’t have to sell your soul or marriage to get it.” Slade didn’t know what Lucifer was talking about, but decided to be silent. This immortal creature could rip him apart with a thought. He wasn’t going to risk his life. Still, there was something nagging him that he needed answering. Asking it might turn the devils wrath on him, but he had to know.

“One more thing, what exactly were Romeo and Juliet doing? What could they have possibly gained by having Batgirl eat the world?”

Lucifer paused. He stopped drinking his wine and turned his dark gaze on Slade. The man tensed in front of the Beast, wondering if he had gone to far. Instead of being smote, Lucifer chuckled.

“Very well, you deserve an answer. Here’s a fact you don’t hear in your houses of worship, Souls are the most powerful sources of energy in the universe and no one can own them. A soul is impossible to contain forever, even in Heaven or Hell, why do you think so many heroes and villains get resurrected, their spirits are too strong to contain. Somehow, those sex demons found away to d the impossible. They bonded a soul with the Urn of Gluttony and owned it. Not only that, they owned all the souls that were consumed. They were trying to do what the Old Man couldn’t, own all the souls in the universe. They would have set their starving victim on creation itself to devour.”

“Why?” Slade asked, wondering what anyone could do with that much power. Lucifer smiled at Slade. His smirk made even Slade’s blood go cold.

“They were going to create a second Big Bang and become Gods of a new universe.” Lucifer snorted, finding the very idea of those two ruling anything laughable. Slade didn’t see the humour. They had come dangerously close to accomplishing their mission and bringing an end to all life. That was not something he found funny one bit.

“If they were going to destroy everything, why didn’t you just kill them?” The second Slade asked that question he knew he had gone too far. Lucifer’s eyes narrowed and it looked like he was going to attack. At the last second Lucifer decided against it, not seeing it worth his time.

“I didn’t kill them to make a point. Demons, angels and everything in between believe themselves to be the overseers of all reality. Today, a moral saved reality and reminded everyone of their use. If I had just burned those two in my fires it would make it seem that we don’t need humanity and as disgusted as I am to say we do need them. Heaven and Hell must know humanity can be depended on to save reality if we are to survive the coming Crisis. Soon, we will all be tested as worlds meet.”

Slade knew if he asked anymore Lucifer would kill him. The former Lord of Hell already had said too much and he made his departure. “We won’t meet again Slade Wilson until you die. Perhaps I’ll let you torture Romeo and Juliet, that is if there is anything left of them. They have been so amusing since I began teaching them their place. I look forward to seeing you in Hell.”

Then he was gone and Slade was left to dwell on his parting words. Not the part about him going to Hell, he knew he was heading there long before the devil popped up on his door, but the other thing. A Crisis? Worlds Meeting? It all left a bad taste in his mouth. Something big was on the horizon and it might even be bigger then the heroes could handle. Alone with his thoughts, Slade reflected, how long do happy endings last?
1422311121111111112111221111111112222211.title: A Final Meeting

The second reason was that even though technically he didn't have any real superpowers, he was still a 7 foot tall giant who was a skilled and brutal fighter who could amazingly still disappear and reaper when he wished despite his large size. Also his Epidermolytic Hyperkeratosis did offer some excellent advantages besides just looking scary, he also had incredibly tough skin and bones that allowed him to take a great deal of punishment, he could also eat things that would kill most people including uncooked meat. The third reason was that he was well liked by the common criminals in Gotham by showing that he took care of his men and would not use them as simple tools as the other crime lords like the Penguin and Two Face did. He moved quick, taking out many of the crime lords in few weeks by having many of them killed by their own men, others he killed personally then eat them, he particular like the Penguin and claimed he tasted like pork, others like Two Face were not killed but instead he would snap their necks with his bare hands leaving them alive but paralyzed for the rest of their lives. The ones that were left got the message, Croc was King.

The one crime boss he didn't want to kill was Baby Doll who was in Arkham at the time because she was one of the few people in the world who didn't treat him like a freak. So he personally lead an attack on Arkham with an army of over a hundred men to free her, he also made sure to burn the place to the ground and kill most of the other inmates, partly to make sure that he wouldn't have any competition but also because of the years of torture he faced when he was a patient there. When Baby Doll asked why he would do go through so much trouble for her he answered in his usually rough and strait forward thinking "I need someone I can trust."
155.title: Killer Croc meets the new Baby Doll

1551.content:
At first everything went fine for King Croc and Queen Baby Doll. They were making a good profit but not enough to draw attention from the FJL who pretty muched ignored them because of the relative peace they brought to Gotham. Their men were loyal and respected their new leaders, and the few crime bosses Croc did not kill, eat, or paralyzed for life, were to afraid to betray the new rulers of Gotham's underworld. However as time went on Baby became increasingly worried about her partner's mental state. He was getting more violent, more aggressive, more animal like. At first she just put if off as Croc being Croc and was able to control her pet by petting him in just the right spots. But after about 6 months he started having head aches that would only go away after he killed and ate something, even though Baby Doll's singing seemed to help. These head aches got worse and worse until they turned into full blown episodes of mindless violence. So far Croc was able to stop him self from hurting Baby Doll or their men by despairing for a few hours. He would come back with his hands and face covered in blood and when Baby Doll asked him what he had been eating he would just mumble something about going to a local meat plant they owned and killing and eating some of the cows. Baby Doll doubted this from the begging, which was reinforced when she saw on the news about how the cops were looking into the murder victims whose bodies were partially eaten and the rest was mutilated.

When Baby Doll confronted Killer Croc about it and telling him how they needed to keep a low profile he started yelling about how they could do so much more and that he was getting bored with just sitting around selling drugs to bums and losers. Baby Doll came right back by screaming that if they tried anything like that they would fine them selves in the belly of a FJL member in minuets. Croc roared that he was King Croc and that he would take on any challengers, he then knocked Baby Doll to the floor with the back of his hand and was just about to rip her head off when for some reason he stopped at the last second. There was just something about Baby Doll that made him not want to kill, maybe it was the fact that she made him feel almost normal, or maybe it was the way she would shot some one in the legs for making a shot joke about her, or maybe it was just the way she sang to him made him felt... loved? The idea of someone actually loving was revolting to Killer Croc who had spent a life time being called a freak and that love was just another form of control, and yet he had spent a life also trying to find someone who could love him. Thats why he treated his men so well, because he wanted to feel respected and admired instead of just feared and hated. All these thoughts made his head hurt and he could feel another one of his episodes coming on so he roared one more time then jumped into the sewer that was right next to their underground hide out.

Baby Doll laid on the floor wiping the blood from her mouth and watched her partner swim away and for the first time since she was busted out of Arkham Asylum she felt truly afraid. And not just that Croc may kill her but if he really was going mad, what would happen to their criminal empire? She may have been the brains behind it, running the day to day coming and goings, but it was Killer Croc that formed it and it was Killer Croc who kept it going. Not only did the men respect him more, they loved him. He was actually a fair and loyal boss who watched over his underlings, making sure those who were loyal were taken care and rewarded instead of just treating them like toys like crime bosses in the past. He was a hero, the last of the real crime lords to stand up against the FJL and he did by setting simple goals that their men could reach. If they found out he was losing his mind they might turn on them in fear that they could no longer protect them. And then there were the other crime bosses that were left in the city, the only reason Croc had let them live was because Baby Doll told him they were going to need people to administer their empire but she doubted that they would show her the same form of mercy if they thought there was a chance for them to bring down her and Croc and take their place as the Kings of Gotham. And the last thing any of them needed was a bloody gang war, that would certainly draw the attention of both the police and the FJL.

And it wasn't just his episodes that were getting worst but he was also getting more aggressive in general, he was becoming increasingly paranoid, he could no longer sit still, he would talk about expanding the empire even though both of them agreed in the begging that it would be a bad idea to do so. He also seemed to enjoy killing more and more, before killing some one was just part of the job of being a crime boss and neither of them were squeamish about shooting some in the stomach and then letting them die a long and pain full death as an example to others. But now Croc would look for any excuse to rip someone a part even when he wasn't having an episode. This worried Baby Doll because despite her attempts to hide it, they men were getting worried that something was wrong with their King.

There seemed to be only one way out for her and Killer Croc. A few days ago she was contacted by Poison Ivy who was once good friends with Croc when they were inmates together in Arkham and was worried that he might be losing his mind do to his Epidermolytic Hyperkeratosis and claimed she might be able to cure both of them if they agreed to join the FJL. At first Baby Doll thought it was a trick to get her to review the secrets of their empire but now seeing how far Croc was falling and that he was dragging her down with him she saw no other choice. Using a pay phone to call the number she was given she told Poison Ivy she would meet her at the docks at noon the next morning since none of her men would be there to see her because they worked at night and even if they did she would claim she was just spying for the gang.

Still not trusting the one time super villain Baby Doll brought her submachine gun teddy bear, and an assortment of other hand guns that were hidden all over he body. Then making sure she looked like the perfect 8 year old girl she walked down one of her and Croc's underground tunnels which not even their men new about.
1551.title: The Rise and Fall of King Croc

15511.content:
A half hour later Baby Doll emerged from the sewer amazingly with out getting any grime on her, she was once asked by Killer Croc how she did it and responded with "It's a girl thing." She then walked to were she was meeting Poison Ivy on the docks, it was a family seafood restaurant that she and Croc used as one of their fronts. She saw Poison Ivy standing out side the door and was wearing civilian clothes and a blond wig like Baby Doll asked her to do.

"Mommy." Called out Baby Doll in her six year old voice and ran over to give Poison Ivy a big hug. Seeing Ivy clearly put off by this show off a faction Baby Doll smiled at her viciously and said softly in her adult voice, "If you double cross me Ivy I will have you in Black Gate for child abuse, then feed Harley to Croc." Poison Ivy new this was no ideal threat and she was willing to bet that she and Killer Croc had her, her lover, and any other known superheroes in the city watched 24/7. She was just glade Bruce had made Wayne Manor not part of the sewer line and that she and Harley now lived on the Watch Tower. But Ivy knew that if something happen to her then Harley would coming look for vengeance and despite all of her skills Harley would be ripped apart by the much larger, much tougher, and much hungry King Croc. Ivy shuddered at the thought of how much fun he would have playing and gorging on her lover's fatty body. But since Ivy had no intention of double crossing ether of them it wouldn't be a problem.

The two woman were lead inside by one of the waiters who after getting a nod from Baby Doll lead them into a private back room she used to conduct business with other crime lords. "So you claim that in exchange for selling out our gang you can cure us?" Baby Doll asked not believing a word that plant themed superhero said. "Yes we believe that we have figured out away to make you look like a normal adult woman using a combination of chemical V and adding the growth hormones that your body is missing." "And what about King Croc, can you make him normal too?" "Not physically but with extensive brain surgery we can reduce the effects of the Epidermolytic Hyperkeratosis to manageable levels. We have already tried out the procedure on Cheetah so we know how to do it." "And what would you need from me?" "All we want is for you two to join the FJL and any of the information you can give us to break up the crime lords in Gotham."

At this Baby Doll laughed in child like but still very creepy way and said still in her child persona "But Mrs. Ivy I'm no tattle tail." "What?" Asked Ivy clearly confused by the turn of Baby Doll's behavior. "You want me to tell you what all my friends are up to that we you can lock them up. But if you think I am going to tell you anything I will have you tired up, dragged into the sewer, and then feed that over stuffed clown of yours to Croc as you watch and then force you to tell me how to save my Crocy." She then giggled like a demented child, sending shiver's up Ivy's spine.

Poison Ivy was now afraid both for her and Harley's lives and for that of Killer Croc. Ivy remembered back in Arkham when the two were actually close friends, true they were both on medication at the time but Ivy saw that Killer Croc was not as evil or as insane as people thought he was, just a sick man with a bad brain looking for love and attention. And with the rumors of his mental problems getting worst she decided to take action. She looked into his and Baby Doll's conditions to figure out if they could be cured. Working with the Leagues best doctors, scientist, and magic users she was able to figure out away to at least save Killer Croc even if she couldn't cure him completely. Now the only thing that could stop her was a criminal mastermind stuck in the body of a six year old girl.

Realizing that she had found the answer Ivy said "Your a virgin aren't you?" This must have hit a nerve in Baby Doll because she whipped out her gun and pointed it at Ivy's head. Still remaining in control despite her heart beating a hundred miles a minuet Ivy continued. "It must be painful watching King Croc having his way with nearly every woman in Gotham. Wishing that you could feel all that power of his inside you, making you feel like the true woman you are inside instead of the little girl you are on the outside. Serving him in away that only a Queen should for her King. But you can't and not only because you are to small for him to fit but because you lack the hormones necessary to enjoy sex with your true love. One of the most basic things about being an adult and you are not even able to take part in it. We can help you with this, the hormones will allow you to finally become an adult. You and Croc can finally be to gather, so please Baby Doll put down the gun and let use help you."

With tears in her eyes Baby Doll sleighed the gun back into her pocket and then blowed her noise on a napkin Ivy gave her. Once she had regain her composer she said "I will not betray my men Ivy. They have been loyal, respectful, and obedient to me and Croc. They have become our family, also if I was to sell them out then they wouldn't stop hunting me until I was dead. However I can give you information on the other crime bosses in Gotham, but first you have to promise me one thing."

"Tell me what it is and I will see if I can do it." Said Poison Ivy with growing admiration for crime lord and her loyalty to her gang.

"Before you have the police arrest the bosses give me time to get some of my men ready to take their placeless as well as mine and Killer Croc's. That way this won't turn into a gang war as our men turn on each other to fill the power vacuum as the next King of Gotham."

"But how will you get Croc to come with you? Because if the rumors about his mental state are true then I don't think he is making very logical decisions."

"I will meet with our top officers and tell them the plan. Most of them are already guessing something is wrong with their king and will want to help him, espeacly if it means they can get a bigger pierce of the pie. Together we will be able to figure out something."

"Will they trust you to keep your word since you will be joining the FJL?"

"They are as loyal as they are greedy. Remember me and Croc built our empire on the foundation of taking care of our men, they really do care for him. Also I don't have to say we are actually joining you, just that I am getting him treatment from you."

"I don't think Gordon or Batman will like having group of crime bosses replaced with another, but an insane Killer Croc is just to dangers to ignore." Said Ivy giving into Baby Doll's demands.
15511.title: Her meeting with Poisin Ivy

choices: Killer Croc learns of the plan
155111.content:
Baby Doll then told Ivy everything she knew, which was quite a lot, about the other crime bosses. Ivy wrote everything down on a yellow note book she had with her. Drug shipments, arms deals, gambling, gang meetings, Baby Doll had kept excellent records of everything that was happening in Gotham at all times. Nothing happen in her Kingdom with out her knowing about it.

"Ok so Jimmy the Farmer is head of the Italians?" Ivy asked.

"Yes and they operate out in the north side of town dealing mostly with cocaine. They grow it in the city in three ware houses they own. That way they don't have to deal with other drug lords as much."

"And the Russians?"

"The Russians are lead by a many named Peter Pig Face. He uses butcher shops to hide the smell his underground fight rings and opium dens in the slums."

"What about the Kongs?"

"The Kongs are little more than a street gang lead by Jack Ice. They run a the projects and it is of vital importance that you take out Ice first."

"Why?"

"Because Ice is a dumb ass who doesn't understand that he needs to lie low. If a gang war does break out it will because he started it in a vain attempt to gain power."

This went on for almost two hours, Baby Doll telling Poison Ivy everything she needed to get arrest warrants for the different gang leaders and their officers why at the same time making sure nothing slipped that could be used against her own gang.
155111.title: Baby Doll spills her guts

choices: The Brain surgery was a success
1551111.content:
Baby Doll was sitting in a waiting room drinking a bottle of red wine thinking about how in just a year her life changed so dramatically. First she was an inmate at Arkham, then she was freed by her one time crime partner Killer Croc, who was then calling himself King Croc because he was on his way to being the head of Gotham's underworld. He then offered for her to be his Queen which she jumped at the chance. And then after a year of being the two most powerful crime bosses in the city she and King Croc were now about to become members of the Fat Justice League.

Her change from mob boss to superhero all started with her meeting with ex-villain Poison Ivy and getting convinced that Croc needed help do to his decaying mental health. Later that same day she meet with her most trusted officers to discuss the plan of getting rid of all the other crime bosses so they would have no one trying to muscle in once Croc left. Lucky for them all of the crime bosses men were more loyal to Baby Doll and King Croc than the ones who were paying them, because in reality all the crime bosses served the two of them. She was also able to convince them that Croc needed treatment and if left uncheck he would have become a danger to them all. So they agreed to help her drug and secure their one time king so that they could hand over to the FJL for treatment.

Over the next two weeks Baby Doll set everything up, she got the police the evidence they needed, she gave the orders her men needed, and she was able to keep King Croc in the dark, as well as the rest of the gang for fear that they would tell him and he would fight back. That was part of the agreement she made with Poison Ivy, if Croc put up a fight and people got hurt they would be forced to eat him. So she did everything in her power to make sure it all worked out and that no one on ether side got hurt.

Then the big day came, the first thing that happen was that Baby Doll placed sleeping pills in Croc's breakfast, once a sleep the officer who had agreed to help her rushed in and tied him to stretcher with iron chains. With Croc still asleep they went to were they were meeting members of the FJL to pick the two of them up. After they were sure their old boss was safe the mobsters moved into position to seas power once the old crime lords were arrested by the cops so there would be no power vacuum to fill. At that same moment Gordon was leading his men to all the different hide outs of those same crime lords arresting them and their high ranking officers.

While all this was happening Baby Doll and Killer Croc were being taken to a FJL base right out side of Gotham so Croc could have the brain surgery that Poison Ivy promised. After Croc woke up in a few days and had gotten use to his new life, Baby Doll would then begin her own treatment of hormones and chemical V which would make her look like an adult woman. Because of the interacting of chemicals Baby Doll would not be able to eat people like the other female superheroes could. But who cares, she would finally be an adult woman. She would no longer be seen as a little girl, no longer would people ask if she had lost her mommy, she could ware sexy clothing with out looking like a kid playing dress up, and more importantly she could have sex. For her entire life she was denied the ability to feel physically attractive to someone, to want them on the most basic and primitive level. Maybe that was one of the reasons she was first drawn to Killer Croc, he was deeply in touched with his animal side in ways Baby Doll could only dream off.

Speaking of Killer Croc, it had been over a day since he went into the operating room and she had hear nothing. The closest thing she had to comfort was when CatWoman and Harley Quin tried to comfort her with kind words and the bottle of wine. She told them to shut up or she was going break the wine bottle over there fat heads. They decided it was best that they left, but they did leave the bottle and a blanket. "If something has happen to my Killer Croc I swear I am going to blow up the Watch Tower, then make Poison Ivy watch as kill Harley Quin from inside her stomach with a butcher knife." Mumbled the drunken Baby Doll before taking one last swig from the wine bottle only to find it was empty, she then collapsed into a drunken sleep with dreams of her being an adult and making love to Killer Croc.
1551111.title: A success

15511111.content:
"Baby Doll wake up. Wake up Baby Doll." Said a gentle voice while at the same time a hand carefully shook her a wake. Baby tried to open her eyes but the bright morning light felt like it was laser beam going strait into her hungover brain forcing her to close them. "Baby Doll you need to get up." The voice said again. Even though she refused to open her eyes she asked "Were am I? Why does my head hurt?" The sweet feminine voice that sounded so familiar answered, "You are in the Gotham FJL base and your head hurts because you drank entire bottle of red wine last night while waiting for Killer Croc to get out of surgery."

It all came charging back to her, the meeting with Poison Ivy, the weeks of plaining, drugging Killer Croc, flying to the base, watching as they rushed him inside before he could awake, waiting for any form of information on his progress, threatening Catwoman and Harley when they tried to help, the glass wine they left behind, after that every thing got fuzzy. She even was able to remember who's voice that was. She opened her eyes just a crack and said weakly "Is Croc Ok?" However before Ivy could answer three hundred pounds of overly happy Harley came bounding into the room and said fairly loud "Red did you Baby she can see Killer Croc yet!" Each high pitched word was like a jack hammer to Baby Doll's brain making her headache a hounded times worst with each syllable. Putting her hands on her ears Baby Doll said with angry growl "Harley if you don't shut the fuck up, I will personally crawl inside your belly and then cut my way out with dull butter knife." "Fine you big meany I just thought you would be happy to see your boy friend but I guess not!" She then stuck out her tung at the dwarf then ran off giggling like an imbecile as Baby Doll could only growl at her.

"Sorry about that, Harley just gets so excited when we are able to rehabilit criminals. I think it's because she feels that means we are doing more than just looking them up in a prison made of fat instead of iron. Or just the potential for new sex partners. Or probably both." Ivy explained. "What ever, good for you. Now where is Killer Croc?!" Said Baby Doll, hopping she could be reunited with the man who maybe her true love. "Just get out of bed and fallow me." Said Ivy.

It was at that very moment that Baby Doll realized she was no longer on the waiting room floor but in a comftable hospital bed wearing a night gown instead of the pink dress she wore. She felt naked with out her dress, not because she was so used to wearing it all the time, but because of all the weapons she kept in there. Having the body of a five year old girl meant she was a target for any bully or thug who came by meaning she never went anywhere unarmed. Turning her cuteness up to as high as it could go, Baby Doll gave Ivy the big puppy dog eyes and the trembling lip and said in her child like voice "Mrs. Ivy could I please have my pink dress? It's so nice and comfy and cute." "If you wanted all the guns, knives, and explosives we found on it, you shouldn't have threatened my girlfriend. Besides after you puked all over it the smell was so bad we had to throw it away." Ivy responded dryly. "Fuck." Said Baby Doll in her normal adult voice. She then fallowed Ivy out of the room and down the hall.

On the way to Croc's room Baby Doll got a better look at the FJL Gotham Base. It was fairly small compared to the Watch Tower and the only superheroes she saw besides Poison Ivy and Harley Quin were Catwoman and Batwoman (Batgirl) who were having fat lesbian sex right in the middle of the hallway. Baby Doll couldn't help but stop and look for a moment for why she was unable to feel attractive to anyone, she had always been curries about sex, trying to understand why so many people liked it. She had kind of hoped that if she could figure out the reason it would break the curse on her body and allow her to enjoy it to. But watching these two fat beauties make love brought whole new questions to mind. The first and most importantly was when she had her grown up body would Killer Croc find her sexy since she wouldn't be able to convert people into fat like they could. Or would he go and find someone with some more meat on the bones as he would probably put it. This was a very scary thought for her to face because she had given up all her power and wealth as the Queen of Gotham just so she could have a chance to be with him.

Ivy saw that Baby Doll was deep in thought when she saw how she was just staring at the two sex partners. Ivy grabbed her small hand and lead her away like a child to Croc's room. Stopping in front of a big reenforced metal door which had the words Killer Croc written on a clip bored attached to the wall next to it. Ivy turned to face Baby Doll and said to the much smaller woman, "Listen the surgery went as it was so post to go. Croc is fine and healthy physically, but will be asleep for the next few days. This is avery important part of his treatment because at this moment his brain is being rewritten." "Is there anything I can do to help him?" Asked a worried Baby Doll. "The most important thing you can do for him is to talk to him. He maybe asleep but on a subconsuse level he is still aware of things around him and that will effect how his brain will work when he wakes up. And it is vital that you tell him why brought him to us or he could wake up resenting you." Said Ivy. She the punched in the code on the key pad sticking out of the door. The door then opened so that Baby Doll could see her partner for the first time in two days. With out a word Ivy walked out of the room, leaving the two ex-criminals in a darken room alone.

Baby Doll stared at Killer Croc who was lying in a massive reenforced hospital bed. It was a strange and scary sight for Baby Doll, the most powerful man she had ever meet was now lying on his back, his massive arms and legs changed to the side of the bed. His head was rapped up in white bandages and his muscular 8 foot tall body was had dozens of wires and tubes sticking out. And each one was connected to dozens of blinking and beeping machines that lied out of sight in the shadows except for the flowing lights and screens that looked little unblinking eyes were watching them. His eyes were closed and his breathing heavy with an oxygen mask on his face. To Baby Doll it looked like he was dyeing instead of healing.

At first Baby Doll was unable to move, she could only look as the man she loved struggled to breath. Then she broke down in tears and ran to the side of his bed and bared her face into his arm's rough crocodile skin sobbing over and over again "I'm sorry! I'm sorry! I am so sorry Croc! I had no choice! You were losing your mind and you were going to get your self killed! And I couldn't let that happen because Croc... I love you!" And she barred her head even further and just cried.
15511111.title: The Brain surgery was a success

choices: They get to the last one
Baby Doll notice something was wrong
155111111.content:
As Baby Doll sobbed on the outside Croc was facing his own problems inside. His mind had become a battle ground for two opposing sides of his personality. One was King Croc, a tall, less animal looking version of Croc, he wore the same black Italian suit and shoes that Croc wore when he took on the name King Croc. He also stood strait up instead of slightly hunched over the real Croc did making him more civilized. He also carried with an air of confidence and command that Croc only had when things were going well. There was just a cold look in his yellow eyes that said he was in charge.

The other one was the Killer Croc side of his personality. It was a massive monster, larger than even Bane and it walked with it's back hunched over and it's massive arms nearly touching the ground. It's face was misshapen by anger with two betty little yellow eyes staring out of it. It's jaws were filled with sharp yellow teeth that were almost too large to fit in it's mouth, with bits of meat sticking in between them. The only clothes it wore were the same dirty ripped jeans Croc used when he was wrestler in a circus. This gigantic version of Croc looked even more like a monster than the real one did. It's skin was rougher and had bony spikes all over it's body, it's hands and feet were more like claws than hands. Every thing about it screamed primal power and freedom. It did not think, it did not feel, it did not care, all it did was kill, eat, and survive.

The two Crocs began their fight in the waters of the Louisiana swamp he was born in and raised by his alcoholic and abusive aunt. It was night with no stars or moon in the sky, the only light was coming from the windows of the shack he had lived in. Killer Croc lunged at King Croc but he moved out of the way just in time letting the monster crash head first into a tree. King Croc then jumped onto the back of his much larger opponent and placed his arms around his neck in an attempt to choke hold, but the beast's neck was to thick so instead he just beat it's head with one of his fist while he used his other arm to hold on to his throat. Killer Croc roared at this and dived under water.

An instead later they remerged but now instead of a swamp it was the first prison he went to when he was 16 it was also the first time he killed someone. A fellow inmate who mocked him for his appearance. He got away with killing him by claiming it was self defense, it wasn't. In Croc's mind the body of the inmate was still laying on the floor of the hallway, a pall moon shined on his dead face revealing the gash were Croc had stabbed him in the neck. The body was still warm and the blood was still running just like the night it happen. But neither of the Crocs cared, they were to busy fighting to notice.

With King Croc still on his back Killer Croc tried to crush him by slamming into the cement wall. And after a few times King Croc fell to the floor, coughing up blood. Killer was about to finish him off when King kicked it in the crotch causing it to howl with pain. This gave King enough time to grab the same knife they used to kill the inmate and began to try and stab Killer except the knife could only leave scratches on the beast's tough skin, barley drawing blood. In an effort to get closer so he could take out the eyes, he ran strait into the monster and tackled it. The force of his attack sent the two fighters barring through the two doors at the end of the hallway, smashing them open as they went through.

Again they landed in a new place from Croc's past. It was the circuses he worked in as a professional wrestler. It was there he learned many things that he would use later in life, the biggest one was the importance of imagery and showmen ship. The concept of making his enemies think he was more of a monster than a man. This served him well when he became a professional criminal, the problem was that after years of making others see him as a monster he came to see himself as one. They had landed in the same ring Croc had fought in, surrounding them were nightmarish faces of the drunks and bastards that had come to watch his shows. But yet again neither of his personalities cared, to them the past was the past and they kept fighting.

Killer Croc knocked King off of him, making him drop the knife which went flying off stage, it then claimed up on one of the poles in the corner of the ring. Killer spread his arms wide and listened to the drunken crowed cheer him on, basking in the warmth of their affection. Then with a mighty roar he attempted to body slam the smaller King Croc, but King was to fast and was able to roar out of the way at the last second. Wasting no time King Croc power drive his elbow into the hulking beast's back. With Killer still stunned King then went on to kick while he was down, the crowd now cheering him and booing Killer. But Killer soon recovered and right before King could kick it a sixth time, it caught King's leg in mid air. Killer Croc then stood up with King in hand and began to toss him around like a rag doll. The crowd was going nuts over the senseless violence, they didn't care who one so long as someone got hurt. Now that it had it's fun Killer was ready to finish it's foe, it grabbed each of King's legs and began to pull. But a second later it felt an sheering pain in it's groan. By pulling King close to it's body Killer had given him a chance for a cheap shot to the balls. Roaring in pain Killer Croc tossed King Croc out of the ring and jumped after him.

The next place they landed was in front of Croc's first home in Gotham. It was a small apartment in the slums, it was dirty, rat infested, and smelled of mold. But it was Croc's home, his place, the only place he had ever felt normal. That was until Batman ruined it and burned it to the ground. It must have been the same night he attacked because the

The two ex-crime lords could only sit on their couch hand in hand as the news washed over them. Neither of them new rather to be excited or terrified at the concept of being parents. But despite that general feeling of worry they were having different thoughts over it.

Croc was seeing it as a sign from his dream were he saw Baby Doll holding a little girl in her arms. Maybe this was his reward for making up for his past mistakes. But was he really ready to be a father. He knew nothing about children, and he wasn't sure if he really wanted to give up his life style right then. He was still getting use to his new life and his new self. The operation helped a great deal to calm his sick and troubled mind, but it also made him feel like he was a different person and needed to find himself all over again. But maybe having a child and starting a family was the way to find his new self, maybe that was what the dream was about. Maybe having a family with Baby Doll was his way to start a new life.

Baby Doll on the other hand was thinking that it was probably be a massive mistake. She would make a terrible mother since her entire childhood was dedicated to being a child star. She may have spent most of her life looking like a child, that didn't mean she knew anything about them. But then again, being pregnant had possibilities for her. That would defiantly put Roxy Rocket in her place. But was she, an ex-queen pin, really fit to be a mother?

After thinking it over for a few minutes the two of them decided to talk about. Croc went first, his mind being a jumble of nerves and thoughts and before he said anything he wanted to hear Baby Doll's thoughts. After all she was a lot smarter than he was and always had a clear head. She was always so crafty, checking every detail before making a decision, unlike himself who just saw what he wanted and the fastest path to get it, never checking for details. "Baby Doll, this is your decision to make. Whatever you decide I will fallow with full support."

By the tone of Croc's voice Baby Doll could tell he had mixed feelings about the whole thing and was unsure of what to do. This surprised Baby Doll because for the entire time they knew each other Croc was always direct, practical, and always knew what he wanted. He saw what needed to be done and he did it. He didn't often let feelings get in the way of things and was always able to get the big picture even if he missed some details, which was the total opposite of herself. She would fret over every little thing, getting hocked up with what was happening at the moment and not the looking at the whole deal. Baby Doll was hoping Croc would be able to at least guide her in the right direction with his strait forward practical thinking. "Before I say anything Croc, I want to hear your thoughts about this."

Croc was both surprised and a little disappointed when she said that. He was hopping she would have the answer, but he guessed even someone as smart as Baby Doll needed help sometimes. So he gave the best answer he could. "I really don't know what to think. There are so many things that can go wrong, like what if the child needs special care because of my condition. Or how can the two of us raise a child? I don't know anything about being a father, what if I screw it up? I'm not sure if I could live with myself if that happen. But another part of me really wants to have the child, maybe she is the start of a new life for us. A sign that we are ready to move on and try to make up for our past mistakes. Yet I can't help but think that we are not ready for this kind of responsibility in our lives. Are we really ready, or are I am just hopping that having this child will answer all my questions. There are just so many things that could happen that it makes me feel dizzy just thinking about."

As Croc finished telling Baby Doll this, she thought deeply about what he just said, still surprised by how deep the giant croc man was. Then after a few minutes of processing it over in her mind, Baby Doll answered. "Croc I have done some horrible things in my life, things that I can never make up for. But maybe this child of ours is a sign that we can move away from our past and be given a second chance. Or maybe she is a test to see if we really can change. Either way I cannot add my daughter to the lost of people I have killed. Croc I think we should keep her."

Croc looked at his small beautiful lover with her big blue eyes that had such strength and intelligence in them that he felt for at least that moment she was right. So he placed his large arm around her shoulder, pulled her in close, and gave her a kiss that sent shivers down the spine while he rubbed her belly were his daughter was growing.

Roxy said after she let Baby Doll out of her embrace. "It seems like you won't be the smallest member of the League any more. Also I'm sorry for the way I acted last night, I just don't always think before I act." Croc cleared his throat and said to Roxy. "Thats great Roxy. But if you don't mind I need to ask Baby Doll something important." Roxy backed off to watch the show.

Croc got down one on knee which seemed to be some kind of signal because Poison Ivy walked up behind him and place in his out stretch hand something the other members couldn't see. He then opened his hand in front of Baby Doll to reveal a gold engagement ring. He then began to give a speech, "Marion Louise Dahl, you know I am a man of few words. But in the past year you have done so much for me. You were my partner in crime, then you saved me from my own mind. Then you helped me find my reason for living. And now you are the mother of my child. Mary my love, my partner, my savior, will you do me the honor of becoming your husband to death do us part." By the time he finished his speech he was almost in tears. But as always Baby Doll know just what to do, she threw her arms around her big green giant with tears in her own eyes while yelling at the top of her longs. "YESSSSS!!!!" Everyone cheered while a few of the woman (including Roxy) could only sniffle at the sight.
1551111112111112.title: In front of the crowd

1553.content:
For the next month Baby Doll and Croc ruled Gotham City. Every robbery went smoothly and anyone that got in their way soon found their way into Croc's stomach. None of the other crime families or gangs stood a chance against him. In fact many of Gotham's criminals left their gangs to work for Croc believing that he was the only crime lord in the city, nay the world that could protect them from the FJL. His hideout in the sewers wasn't luxurious but it was well hidden and a labyrinth to move through. Anytime a cop went looking down there they were soon taken down by Croc easily.

As for Croc's partner Baby Doll she was enjoying her new partnership. Even though she was working with a carnivorous, man-eating monster she felt completely safe with Croc and trusted him with her life. She did a pretty good job managing his gang when he was busy and planning out the various crimes perfectly. While living in the sewers wasn't something she liked it was better than Arkham. Baby Doll owed Croc a debt of gratitude and would do anything for him. The longer she was with him the more attracted she became of him, She had feelings for him a while ago but seeing him slurp down a lowlife was kind of a turn on for her. She didn't let Croc know and would spy on him as he ate people.

Eventually though their crime spree came to a grinding halt. One night Killer Croc and Baby Doll arrived at an abandoned warehouse ready to make a switch off. The two had been waiting a long time and were getting antsy. Suddenly, the lights went out and in seconds the two were knocked out. When Croc came too he was in a cage and Baby Doll was missing. He looked around to find her when his kidnapper said, "Missing a little girl?" He growled and looked to see who was responsible for this.
1553.title: Baby Doll and Croc are finally captured

info.brief_description: Sequel to the Harley storyline in TV Expansion, Vore, ect. FJL & Teen Titans Vore
info.description:
What you are about read is a sequel to the Harley storyline in the interactive "TV Expansion, Vore, Weight Gain, Unbirth". Which you can read by following this link:
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1017006/map/155222222211

It follows the same continuity where that one left off, but this one is whole different ball game. Which is expected because this one centers around the Justice League and the Teen Titans

Make sure you read the Harley Quinns storyline before this so you are not confused, even though you'll enjoy vorish DC girls no matter what.

I don't really have any rules, other than that things don't get too crazy for no reason. Say if somebody gets as big as the planet, it can't just be out of the blue.

So go on now, and read about the ladies who fight for truth, justice and big meaty behinds!
